name: Beverly Jones
text: I had a consult with Dr. Pearce for a breast augmentation and possible full Mommy makeover and immediately knew I was in the right place for me! From the moment I walked in the door I felt such a calm and welcoming atmosphere. The entire staff made sure to make me feel welcomed, valued, and comfortable from the time I entered the waiting room until leaving their office. Dr.Pearce was so personable, super informative, down to earth and most importantly made me feel comfortable and at ease the entire visit. I never once felt pressured or like just another person to him. He made sure that I knew he was there for me and answered any and all questions that I had and made me feel like I was his only patient that day! I would recommend this office and their entire staff 100 times over!

name: Renee S.
text: I am one to read reviews but never write them.   I really felt today I should take the time to mention how wonderful Dr. Pearce and his staff are.   Dr. Pearce listens to your concerns and then offers great suggestions.   The entire staff makes sure everything is perfect as far as medical history, medications needed, and appointments times confirmed.   Very happy with results.   I would highly recommend Dr. Pearce!!!!

name: Bonnie Bartelt
text: Dr. Clinton is not only a great and experienced Plastic Surgeon, he is very knowledgeable, compassionate, honest, patient and a great listener. He is very honest about expectations and makes sure he understands your motivation for the procedure. He suggests procedures that will provide results his patients want.  Dr. Clinton is patient with consultations and gives the patient as much information as possible. He encourages questions and concerns. His office is beautiful, clean and safe. The staff are very welcoming, personable, well trained and accessible.

name: Amanda Favret
text: I had a lovely experience at Reveal Beauty. I was immediately and kindly greeted at the entrance and promptly brought to my consultation room. My nurse, Amanda was so professional and patient with me. She noted importantly things in writing and was patient in answering all of my questions. Dr. Pearce then met with me and further answered questions. He made me feel so comfortable and I never felt rushed. He is extremely knowledgeable and dedicated to the best result for me! I’m so pleased with this practice.

name: Becky Corbin
text: I couldn’t ask for a better experience than I had here!!  From the first phone call to the surgery itself everyone was Great!!  Dr. Pearce did a wonderful job with my surgery.  He was very caring and personable!!  I highly recommend them!!!

name: Greg Craven
text: My wife visited Dr. Ben and she is very happy.  She was concern because she needed to remove a pimple from her face. Since it was on her face she was worried about the scar. Ben answer all her questions and listen to her concerns. Today she feels very happy with her treatment and totally recommend Reveal Beauty.  Happy wife.

name: Hayley Jordan
text: I felt right at home! They make everything feel so comfortable. Extremely warm and welcoming. My constant was amazing. Dr. Clinton has excellent bedside manner and I can’t wait to get my procedures done with him.

name: Dena Burt
text: Very professional and friendly staff... Very caring atmosphere and always available.  Would definitely recommend Reveal Beauty to others.

name: Katherine
text: Dr. Pearce is very personable and has a calm demeanor- which is wonderful if you are trying out a treatment for the first time. He gives his advice but also listens to your input. I highly recommend seeing him at Reveal Beauty. I will be back!

name: Jessica Wright
text: I came to see Dr. Clinton for breast augmentation. He was so thorough in explaining to me my options during the consultation. I booked my surgery with ease and the price was very reasonable! I am extremely pleased with my brand new breasts. Dr. Clinton and his staff took excellent care of me before, during and after my surgery. I recommended Reveal Beauty to everyone I can!

name: Jasmine “Queen Jazz” Webster
text: I would highly recommend this office! Everyone was very welcoming and understanding! They explained everything thoroughly and were very honest!!Cant wait to come back!

name: Elizabeth Sandoval
text: This is not a practice that tries to get as many patients moved through as possible. They truly care about the individual. They take as much time discussing your treatment with you as you need. They make you feel as if you are their only patient. Professional atmosphere, highly skilled doctors, amazing results, and competitive prices. I have used both doctors for several treatments and procedures and will return. The staff deserves as much praise as the doctors.

name: Marshella Dimples
text: I got a tummy tuck and liposuction on December 23, 2020. Everyone there is very nice. Dr. Ben Pearce did my surgery, he was upfront about everything and I did exactly what he told me in order to heal properly. I love my results even though it's only been 2 months since my surgery. Just starting to work out again and I'm loving that as well. Thank you Dr. Pearce for a wonderful new beginning for me!🙏👍😃. By the way he has a very pleasant demeanor 🤭

name: Ashley Peck
text: I am very happy with my breast augmentation results! Dr. Pearce and his staff did an amazing job from consultation to post-op appointments. I have wanted this procedure done for several years but have been nervous to follow through with it. Dr. Pearce and his team calmed my nerves through thorough explanations. He also heard my concerns and answered all questions I had. I am very happy with how they turned out how natural they look!

name: Kayla Carlisle
text: Dr. Pearce and Amanda have been so amazing!!! I had a breast reduction and lift and from the time I scheduled my consult to my surgery and recovery Dr. Pearce and his team have been nothing but amazing. They have always made me feel welcome and comfortable. I am EXTREMELY pleased with the way my breast look! I was so nervous of a botched surgery but that was the furthest thing from what I got.

name: Sharon Jacobs
text: I was discharged and it was not caught until the day of my surgery.  I had to ask about a refund again on my one week check up.  I got breast implants, but the did not listen and put in smaller than I requested. The staff are very nice as is the dr.

name: Angel Tumlin
text: Excellent Experience! Dr. Pearce and Staff are Amazing! They are Professional Christians, Courteous and Patient.  I'm 5 weeks out from a Breast Removal & Replace and an Abdominalplasty, I can't help but smile every time I see myself in the mirror.  (Mainly because of the Abdominalplasty).  My results are Fabulous. Thank you Dr Pearce and Staff for getting rid of something my vigorous workouts couldn't.

name: Kristen Steffes
text: I cannot say enough great things about Reveal Beauty! Dr. Pearce is amazing! I had a tummy tuck done 2 months ago, and I could not be more pleased with my results! Dr. Pearce was able to answer every single one of questions as well as give me answers to questions I didn’t think to ask! He is very professional and his bedside manner is great! He makes you feel extremely comfortable, and his work is phenomenal! I highly recommend Reveal Beauty and Dr. Pearce for any work you need done!

name: ciara staley
text: The process from beginning to end has been exceptional! I couldn’t have asked for a better surgeon. Dr. Pearce is professional, kind, willing to answer any questions to ease your mind of any doubts. He performed a breast reduction on me. My preop appt was very organized & had everything laid out to perfection. As someone who loves organization & wonderful staff.. I definitely give 5 stars! I came in nervous in the beginning because I was unsure of what I was getting myself into, but I will be coming back & will recommend anyone to use this facility! Thank you for everything, Dr. Pearce ❤️

name: Addy M
text: I had a breast reduction done by Dr. Peace and was thoroughly satisfied with my end results. Dr. Pearce and his staff made the experience very comfortable and professional!

name: Mary Rogers
text: Very pleasant first time visit. Reid was so sweet and explained what she was going to do and how it would feel and sound. I am looking forward to next visit.

name: anne m.
text: The entire office is calm, friendly and efficient.  Dr.Pearce performed my procedures and is fantastic.   I have been beyond pleased with the results!  Dr. Pearce also takes the time to listen and address any and every question.  I highly recommend him.

name: Julia Eaton
text: I absolutely love Dr Clinton and his staff. They truly practice what they preach on their ads. He wants you to love the body and features God gave you by just revealing the beauty you already have.

name: Mia H
text: I attended a consultation today with Dr. Pearce. I really enjoyed myself!!! Dr. Pearce was very kind, attentive, informative and honest. I am so excited about scheduling my procedure with Dr. Pearce. He really made me feel very secure about choosing him for my procedure (bbl). His assistant Abigail was very pleasant, professional and represent the center well.

name: diane clark
text: Never have a met a more compassionate staff and physician. I am always pleased with the care and professionalism that I receive there. Thank you, Dr. Clinton and staff!

name: Bj Babineaux
text: Reveal Beauty   Dr.Pearce is wonderful, polite,clean, caring, all around wonderful man and doctor. I came in alil worried with a lot of questions, but Dr.Pearce made me comfortable from the moment he stepped in the room, he listened to what I wanted, explained how it all would take place step by step, didn’t rush me at all. Dr. Pearce called himself to check on me and was always available so if your looking for a comfortable secure safe trusted doctor please go see Dr. Pearce you’ll feel so safe and satisfied. I knew I had found my perfect doctor at that moment. The staff are a group of beautiful kind hearted young women that make you feel so welcome and so attentive to everyone.

name: Leighton Hope
text: Dr. Ben Peace did an amazing job and was very thorough in answering any questions I had throughout the entire process!!

name: Andi Watson
text:
Dr. Pearce was great! He was respectful and really listened to my concerns and questions.

My surgery was today and his entire staff were angels. I couldn’t request Dr. Pearce and reveal beauty more!!

name: Abby Jones
text: I loved my time at Reveal Beauty! I have gone to both Dr. Pearce and Dr. Clinton for injectables and cannot recommend them enough. They make the experience comfortable and enjoyable. I love that my results have a natural look - my friends notice a beautiful change but never “too much” work!

name: ashley phillips
text: Dr. Pierce did 1cc on my lips an they are amazing! I plan on coming back for another! He is nice, intelligent, and professional with his work. I have absolutely no worries about my upcoming 300cc breast augmentation surgery.

name: Kathi Conn
text: This experience was such a delight because everyone who assisted Mike Clinton the surgeon were so delightful. Everyone made it so comfortable for me and the time there was so pleasant. I was introduced to all staff and they were such beautiful people.

name: tracye roberts
text: I had a phenomenal experience at Reveal Beauty with Dr Ben Pearce.  I have had fillers with him and recently the baby pixel.  I am loving the results!!  Everyone there is friendly,  informative and made me feel very comfortable and at ease about the procedure!!  They are simply the best!!

name: Lori Deavers
text: Dr. Pearce and the staff are very knowledgeable and personable. The care is comprehensive and everyone makes you feel comfortable during your visits!

name: Caroline Moore
text: I am so impressed by Reveal Beauty.  I had always been reluctant to go into a plastic surgeon’s office, unsure of what to expect. I am in my late 50’s and I didn’t think it was something I would ever do. However, after hearing recommendations from friends I decided to give it a try. I am so glad that I did! From the moment you walk in the door you are greeted with professionalism and friendliness. It is such a serene and easy experience. I went in for a consult with Dr. Clinton and was so impressed. He is a great listener and spent so much time with me. He listened to my concerns and what I wanted to address then offered solutions ranging from surgery to less intrusive options. One of the things I like best about this office is the absence of pressure to do anything that you may not feel comfortable with or ready for. Their office policy is truly reflected in their name “Reveal Beauty”.  The doctors emphasize enhancing your individual beauty, with the objective of achieving a relaxed more youthful look rather than an overdone look. I underwent the C02 laser treatment and the results are amazing! So worth it! In addition to the professionalism and competence of the doctors, the staff is so friendly, kind, patient and helpful. I especially appreciated their follow up after my procedure. They are all so focused on the patient’s wishes and comfort during consult and treatment. I was so impressed that I will be returning for a bleph.

name: Carol Colbert
text: Always courteous and kind.  Dr. Clinton listens intently to your desires and then makes it happen to the best of his ability while exercising his best judgment.  I have always been grateful for his care and look forward to my next procedure!

name: Karin Favret
text: I recently received injectables from Dr. Ben Pearce and I had the most pleasant experience. I am new to injectables and he was patient, gentle, and made my experience so enjoyable. My results are more wonderful than I could’ve imagined. I booked my next appointment right after so I can keep my skin looking so radiant. Thank you Dr. Ben Pearce and Reveal Beauty staff. See y’all soon!

name: Erica Culver
text: I have nothing but great things to say about Dr. Pearce and the Reveal Beauty staff. They are very personable, respectful and patient. I am very pleased with my experience and my results. Highly recommend!!

name: Lena P
text: The staff made you feel welcomed and they were friendly. They made you feel special. The Dr. even took the time out to speak to my boyfriend over the phone about my situation.

name: Courtney Ridgeway
text: The staff are wonderful and make you feel comfortable every visit.

name: Candy Pruitt
text: Very Professional and wonderful environment. Will go back for facials.

name: katie caldwell
text: I can't say enough about Dr. Pearce and all of his staff! The whole experience succeeded my expectations- his knowledge of what I needed and understanding exactly what I wanted, the extreme friendliness of the staff, etc. This is the only plastic surgery clinic I will ever use or recommend.

name: Donald Smith
text: Great experience, friendly, courteous and responsive team led by Dr. Pearce. Took care of my issue and I'm happy with the results, wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Pearce and the entire team at Reveal.

name: Tonia Patterson
text: I was lucky enough to meet Dr. Ben Pearce on March 17, 2021 for Botox and my very first ever fillers around my laugh lines and jowls. What a difference I immediately saw with the filler. He put my serious fear at ease about needles and numbed me up really well before he began. I appreciate how he examined my face to determine the best areas to inject and took his time while injecting both the filler and Botox.  I absolutely love the results. I highly recommend Dr. Pearce and will definitely be seeing him in the future for Botox and touch up filler! Wonderful experience!

name: Brandy Erickson
text:
Dr Pearce and the amazing staff at Reveal Beauty made this a no brainer! From beginning to end I have felt comfortable with the decision I made to undergo a tummy tuck. I have had scars across my abdomen from pyloric stenosis & an appendectomy. Unfortunately, I have also had no ability to get a six pack, no matter how hard I worked out nor how thin I was...this was a favorite benefit of the surgery as Dr Pearce fixed my abdominal muscles so they’re United, I have the ability to actually use and feel my abdominal muscles! The care, patience & thoughtfulness I received while under Dr Pearce’s care was unlike any other! I highly recommend anyone interested in having “you’re best You” going forward, check out Revealing Beauty! You will absolutely be impressed with them & your new You!!!!
PS
There are some amazing side effects of this bright new YOU.... you’re going to love your results so much that you’re likely to be dedicating much of your time to fitness, which is going to force you outta the coronavirus depression & into a vibrancy & inner confidence that is an extraordinary bonus!! Hello Healthy, Happy, New You!!! 😍🥰😍

name: Lauren Nathanson
text: Dr. Ben Pearce did a fantastic job in aiding me on my journey of  becoming more comfortable in my own skin with his treatment. He has excellent bedside manner and is genuinely kind. One of my favorite things about Dr. Pearce is his honesty. I went in wanting two treatments, and he was open about me only needing one and not both. He was able to kindly and gently offer suggestions about products or treatment I may need or from which I would benefit the most. I could not have been happier with my choice of doctor.

name: Jack Burnette
text: Dr. Clinton and Dr. Pearce are wonderful to work with and I am very pleased with the procedures I have had done to improve my self image. All of the staff are wonderful to work with as well.

name: Malcolm Bonds
text: I was impressed with Dr. Pearce from the moment I met him. He's very caring and attentive.  He said something at my initial visit with him that really made me decide it was he that I wanted to do my surgery.  He said, "I like doing surgery, but."  The "but," was in reference to the procedure I wanted him to preform, with some doubt if the surgery would achieve what I wanted.  I really appreciated his honesty. So I agreed, regardless of the outcome, because I didn't like looking my  turkey neck. I was more than satisfied.  I was so happy to see my new look.  I think of him everyday when I look in the mirror.  As well as being more than satisfied with his work, I enjoyed his bedside manner.  He was fun to get to know.  I can't say enough good things about his work and his personality.  I am forever grateful.

name: Jenah Connell
text: I am so pleased with my experience! I love Dr. Pearce!! Highly recommend!

name: Lindsey Kurnick
text: I have had the best possible experience with Dr. Pearce. From the moment I made my consultation the service was first class and he made me feel incredibly important. Each time I walked in the door I was greeted by name and seen rather promptly. I had a full tummy tuck, breast lift and Lipo off my lower back. Just as anyone else my end result was really important to me and Dr. Pearce went above and beyond, he didn’t leave me with a narrow straight up and down body that I see so often with TT, he made sure I had a nice hour glass shape, he worked some serious magic with my breasts also, they don’t look like I’ve breast fed 3 kids at all. Dr. Pearce listened and understood my lifestyle and I could not be any happier with my results. I am so glad he is whom I trusted to do my procedure. I truly cannot say enough good things about him as a surgeon. After consulting with several surgeons there is no doubt that Dr. Pearce was the absolute right choice. Thank you so much for giving me my confidence back.

name: Jamie Loyd
text: I’ve been wanting lip fillers for a long time and I finally got the courage to do it.. Dr Pearce made me feel super comfortable with my decision and did an amazing job. I’m super happy with the results!

name: corey hooks
text: Staff is always so helpful and friendly. Nice, clean office and rooms.

name: Lorrie Lawson
text: Everyone here is so friendly and professional. I wish all clinics had to set their standards after this one

name: Sarah Singleton
text: I recently had a surgical procedure with Dr. Pearce. He was amazing to work with. He was patient with when I had so many questions about what I wanted to have done. He was honest and helpful in making my decision for what I needed and wanted. I was absolutely amazed at my results. I couldn’t have picked a better surgeon.

name: Tannas Knox
text: I had a Mommy Makeover 8 weeks ago and I am very pleased with the work Dr. Pearce did.  He had great bedside manners and was a professional at all time.  My results are wonderful!  (Full tummy tuck with breast lift and implants).

name: Sarah Raines
text: Dr. Pearce gave me fantastic Botox! In fact it’s because of him that now I’m hooked! Thank you Dr. Pearce! Not only did it get rid of my wrinkles, it made my self confidence about getting older so much better! Highly recommend!

name: Saray Jimenez
text: Great service! Wonderful pleople!

name: Heather Wills
text: Dr. Pearce was simply fantastic to work with. He listened carefully to what my goals were and he explained carefully how we were going to get there. Throughout entire process (from consultation through post operative visits) Dr. Pearce was very responsive. I am thrilled with the results of my bleph and eyebrow lift

name: rm martin
text: Over 20 years ago, I had a breast reduction and have never been happy with results...scarring was horrible  and the left side significantly larger. I consulted Dr. Pearce for a scar revision and breast lift. He took the time to really listen to my concerns and ensured that we were agreement about how to correct my issues while still getting a desired result. I am truly amazed and thrilled with the results! My breasts are symmetrical, the scars are now clean and match on both breasts, and they are so perky! Dr. Pearce made himself available to me for any post-op questions or concerns via text or email, even after hours. He is very pleasant and friendly. I highly recommend him for any procedure!

name: kimberly hockett
text: I have had such a great result  from my surgery with Dr. Pearce. He is so professional and patient with answering your questions. I had liposuction done abdominoplasty and also my breasts done and I must say I do look amazing .I want to thank him for all the work that he's done for me. He's a great surgeon.

name: Morgan Hepburn
text: Dr. Pearce repaired my earlobes after I had gauges. He did a wonderful job. It was a painless experience, and I’m without scars. Dr. Pearce is attentive to his patients and listens to their needs. I highly recommend his work.

name: Marc Stowe
text: I had a facelift, neck lift, facial fat transfer and blepharoplasty done by Dr. Ben Pearce, and I could not have had a better experience.  This talented young doctor and I were on the same page from day one as to what results I should expect.....he's extremely personable, and I was very comfortable and at ease at every step of the process.  I have had so many compliments on Dr. Ben's work, and if I ever want anything else done, he is the only surgeon that I will consider.

name: since since
text: The operation was performed and we injected fat. As for the back fat sculpting, the result was negative, as the area was not sculpted.  As for the waist, one more area was carved than the other for fat injection, so the result was not very satisfactory.

name: karin mayes
text: Dr Pearce is really great. Takes time with patients and my results were the best. I highly recommend.

name: Katherine Hilton
text: Dr. Pearce was great, and the office staff is absolutely the friendliest, most personable group I’ve ever met in a doctor’s office. Great experience!

name: Dan Back
text: Very Pleased with my results from the surgery I had done. I was pain free after my second day post operation. Overall great experience for me and will be recommending people in the future if they are looking for a plastic surgeon in the Birmingham area

name: Jill butler
text: I cannot say enough good things about Dr. Pearce and his bedside manner. I have had 2 rounds of plastics with him. I could not be more pleased with my results and the surgeon I chose.

text: I can not say enough good things about Dr. Michael Clinton and his staff. He made me feel so comfortable during my consultation. text: Amazing staff and doctor! Great results! Everyone is very helpful and kind! Will visit again.

name: Holly Davis
text: Dr. Pearce performed my surgery TT,MR, explant/implant , lipo to face and neck , arms , and flanks, and inner and outer thigh area . I am elated  with my results . He is an amazing doctor. I would highly recommended him to anyone .   And I definitely will be back in the future !

name: Dinah Wilson
text: Staff is very friendly and accommodating.

name: Brett Lane
text: Dr.Ben Pearce- did a fantastic job ! Happy with all the results- Very professional- very happy !

name: Juanetta jemison
text: Very friendly and caring staff. Dr. Clinton is an awesone Christian man. He makes you feel  comfortable with his care. If you're driving from outside of the area, you have the option to stay in a very comfortable suite over night after surgery. The office is beautiful and serene. Dr. Clinton and his staff would be my only choice for future surgeries.

name: tori watkins
text: I absolutely love Dr Clinton and his staff! So warm yet professional.  This was my 2nd breast reduction and I could not be more pleased!! I had very little pain and had no problems reaching someone when I had questions or concerns. I recommend on the highest level!!!

name: Meghan Bullard
text: So glad I went to Dr. Clinton over all the other surgeons!! First, the office is beautiful and makes you feel at home. The nurses are incredibly sweet and go the extra mile to give you all the information to help decide what's best for you. I had such a dilemma deciding whether to use saline or silicone, and the nurse even met with me an additional time before surgery to help me decide. Best of all, Dr. Clinton is excellent! I trusted him completely to do the best job and he did! I am thrilled with my results and he always made me feel comfortable. The office staff knows you on a first name basis and worked with me so much to make it all possible! Thank you all so much!!

name: Chris C
text: Dr. Clinton and his staff are incredible!  They treat you like you're part of the family.  I was so impressed by the professionalism and overall care they provide.  Dr. Clinton is a gifted surgeon and his work is proof of that.  I highly recommend him for all your PS needs.  I know I wouldn't go anywhere else.   I love everything about this office!

name: Jo Ann Milam
text: Great staff, office run very well. Medical assistant very informative and helpful. Dr. Clinton has great bedside manner, very respectful of my feelings and concerns. Due to my age (62) he was especially cautious about my overall good health and required my internist to sign off on surgery. Dr. Clinton did a phenomenal job, I'm extremely pleased with entire experience!

name: Lila Bowman
text: Don’t waste your hard earned money!! Lipo 👎🏾

name: Patricia Sanford
text: Everyone has been so kind and helpful. My husband was very pleased also with the care I received. It really impressed him when Dr. Clinton said that he had consulted with another doctor about my procedure. He said that let him know Dr. Clinton was not arrogant, even though he had been doing this for a long time: he didn't think he knew everything. He was also impressed when Dr. Clinton called that night to check on me. My experience was great.

name: Stacy Lovoy
text: I am only 1 month post op and I am already so pleased with my breast reduction and abdominoplasty! The entire staff at Clinton Plastic Surgery Staff has been so helpful with every question or concern I had. Dr. Clinton goes above and beyond to not only to meet my expectations but to also help me understand the work he can do. Bar none...I will be a return patient!

name: Tiffany Horne
text: Dr Clinton and his staff are top notch. I went in for a breast reduction and then 2 months later had him fix an unrelated issue that was going on. Everyone there is so nice and understanding. I never felt uncomfortable or embarrassed. They truly care about making their patient’s lives better.

name: Jessica Jennings
text: Absolutely grateful and completely happy with my results. The people are amazing. Dr. Clinton is beyound heaven sent. If I could say Thank you a million times it still would not be enough. My life is forever changed and every single person whom I have got the plessure to speak to or deal with through out this amazing journey I owe my Thanks to. Dr. Clinton himself will forever hold a special place in my heart for giving me this chance to feel normal and beautiful. Thank you a million times ❤

name: Marie Walker
text: Over a period of several years, our each and every encounter with Dr. Clinton, his expertise and professional, caring office staff has been a wonderful experience. Not only is Dr. Clinton a skilled and qualified surgeon I feel can trust, but the atmosphere is one of respect,warmth and integrity.. I absolutely would recommend Clinton Plastic Surgery!! An answer to prayer for me!😊

name: Meredith Stutts
text: From consultation to post surgery follow up Dr. Clinton and his staff were amazing. My only regret is that I didn't do the surgery years ago. I would highly recommend Dr. Clinton. If you are questioning surgery go for a consultant and you will not regret it.

name: Desiree Spies
text: I had upper and lower eyelids,  lower facelift and Pixel treatment on Dec 4. Could not ask for better care. Recently went back for more filler around my nose and mouth, quick and relatively painless!

name: Leah Carmichael
text: I saw Dr. Clinton several times for various non-surgical procedures over a period of years. I went to  another doctor to save money once and came right back to Dr. Clinton. Even though he isn't the cheapest place in town, I felt his expertise was worth the extra cost. However, the last time I was in his office the staff was extremely rude. He instructed me to call anytime with questions about the products I purchased. When I did his assistant refused to come to the phone. She told the receptionist that I needed to schedule an appointment if I had any questions. I made a comment to the receptionist that I could purchase products from another doctor if they weren't willing to support me. She told me not to get defensive. Considering I've spent thousands of dollars with the practice I expected to be treated with more respect. It's unfortunate that I will have to find another doctor with the same good qualities as Dr. Clinton, but I refuse to put up with snobbish office staff.

name: Misty Doles-Busic
text: Dr Clinton and his staff have always been so accommodating and compassionate. I always feel relaxed knowing that I'm taken care of when I'm in their hands. I would recommend Dr Clinton to anyone!

name: Vicki Grey
text: The staff and doctor were very informative, friendly and honest. After leaving my appointment, I was very satisfied and knew that I did not need to look any further. I found the doctor for my surgery. I feel at ease and confident about choosing Xlinton Plastic Surgery.

name: Chelmense Gladness
text: Really nice atmosphere. The doctor was very personable and he explained everything thoroughly.   He answered all of my questions as well.   The staff was very nice too.

name: Heather Read
text: A truly great experience!!  The staff was so friendly and warm, the office was so inviting and comfortable!  Will definitely go back and recommend to all of my friends and family!!!

name: LISA MCDANIEL
text: Great staff. DR. Clinton is so nice! Very good experience!!

name: Milca Hernandez
text: Docto Clinton, is excellent in what he does, his staff is very professional and go above and beyond what their duties are.

name: Sheila Snoddy
text: What an amazing helpfu group. They made what could have been a scary experience the absolute best with so much one on one attention and care.

name: Heather fowler
text:
I was so excited for my consultation for breast augmentation. The staff was friendly, but Steinmetz was so incredibly awful. I felt judged the entire time he was in the room, and he rolled his eyes at me at least 4 times over my life choices, such as how long I breastfeed my children, my goals for better looking breasts, etc...I felt humiliated. It was already very  uncomfortable for me to show my breasts, and have them handled and analyzed by a strange man in front of my husband....and would have been the same (or worse) even if my husband wasn't w me...I fought back tears after he left the room. He acted like I was ridiculous and freakish for favoring larger implants over anchor scars bc of my current breast size. And how dare I consider that possibility...not knowing anything about plastic surgery....

His assistant was very "salesy" and tried to talk me into a lift or reduction instead of implants. Maybe that's my only option...but the scars were VERY visible no matter how hard she tried to convince me they weren't. I understand bc of my anatomy, I may have limited options, but we said from the beginning, anchor scars were a deal breaker. His portfolio was unimpressive, and a lot of women's breasts looked better to me and my husband in the before pics than the afters.

I wouldn't hire a plastic surgeon for their personality, and this one was supposed to be a "perfectionist," but the way he judged me the entire time, and pretty much made me feel incredibly unattractive and stupid made me want to leave his office as fast as possible. I'll have a second opinion this Friday. Hopefully this surgeon will have some respect for the people who are considering hiring him.

name: K S
text: He was extremely rude and unprofessional. Never gave proper answers or explanations. This was just after a consultation. Not sure if we will go back.

resp.text: If you would like to contact me directly at jskinner.sps@gmail.com . Dr. Steinmetz is very thorough with his consultations. I would like to understand what happened so we can address this matter.

name: Nora Fulton
text: I had a breast reduction done and I was suppose to have a lift with it but that didn’t happen.  I will not recommend him to anyone, I also still have those puppy ears on the side where the drainage tubs were. I have talked with him and he didn’t show any concern as far as trying to satisfy me as a patient.

name: Unique MissD
text: He's the best! I'm very satisfied

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Elisa Ledbetter
text: Dr. Steinmetz is not only an amazing, skilled surgeon, but he along with his wonderful team have been a blessing! From the first conversation with his wonderful office manager, Jennifer, to meeting Dr. Steinmetz for the first time, I felt so at ease knowing I was with a team who generally cared about me as a person, not just another patient! Dr.Steinmetz uses something that I do not believe any other plastic surgeon does for their post mastectomy patients that was absolutely instrumental in me having almost NO PAIN post op! He uses a Marcaine "ball" that slowly releases the anesthetic into the wound over several days! I literally took no narcotic for post op pain (although I did have a prescription for it) and walked for almost a mile 3 days post op! This was absolutely unbelievable and my family and friends could not believe I had a double mastectomy! As an RN and CRNA, I so APPRECIATE the wonderful advocate I have in Dr. Steinmetz to assure to the best of his abilities that his patients are optimally covered for pain relief without having to rely so heavily on narcotics and all the side effects! Dr. Steinmetz and his terrific staff, Jennifer, Ashley and Hope, continue to care all during your "journey"! They offer such helpful advice and, very important, the end results are beautiful! With much appreciation, great respect and sincere gratitude, Elisa Cogen

name: Michael Whitehead

text:
I had a breast augmentation 6 weeks ago and couldn’t be happier. The staff and Dr.Howard was very professional. They helped answered all my questions and kept me comfortable during my healing stage. I freaked out at first because one breast sat higher than the other (which is totally normal in the beginning) and Dr. Howard kept telling me to be patient it would be perfect, which it is. I went with 650 CC silicone implants and I could not be happier. I am looking forward to having A tummy tuck with Dr. Howard this Fall.

Also, I do have scaring. My scars sit perfectly in the folds and the bottom of my breast and are not visible at ALL unless I lift my breast purposely to see. I’m surprised my scars are as small as they are.

Couldn’t have chosen a better doctor.

text:
Arrogant,  less than good results. Scars visible. Doesn't care about his MISTAKES.
Condescending to the patient. Maybe ok long time ago, not now.  Wish I had never gone there.

resp.text: I'm shocked by your review and concerned regarding your statements as you didn't show for your last appointment. Like any specialty, surgeons are not always able to control how patients heal, especially when the patient fails to return for post-operative appointments. I'm sorry you have chosen such a public platform to express your dissatisfaction of your surgical results, instead of honoring your last appointment. We were very appreciative of you and enjoyed having you as a patient. Not to mention, we loved your gifts of fresh fruit.  We wish you the best.

name: James Frink

Dr Howard is not your average/usual  doctor !  On the contrary , he's very open and

His office staff (office manager is his wife) is efficient and they, too,  are very personable. Of course the most important thing is that he is highly skilled... His office is so easily accessed.. right off highway 31 in Hoover behind full moon barbeque and across 31 from Krispy Kreme.
I am happy to highly recommend dr. Howard from my personal results and those of my 2 friends.

text: I should have trusted my gut and never came back or booked surgery here. Dr. Hedden came off as very judgmental, lacked any bedside manner and completely botched my procedure. It’s been 5 years and they are still there, hardly faded at all. Please avoid him for any type of liposuction procedures. I can’t speak to his work on other types of procedures since I did not get anything else. Best of luck, trust your intuition, and only go with doctors that don’t make your alarm bells go off. Severely regret this mutilation to my body and waste of thousands of dollars.

name: vakeshia ellison
text: This place is BS. I had a surgery scheduled and had to cancel due to the flu. They are quick to get your money but will come up with EVERY excuse for a reason to not give you your money back upon giving reasonable documentation. I wouldn't recommend this place to a dog.

resp.text:
We’re sorry she feels this way. We always review the cancellation policy with everyone. One you schedule everything is completely refundable up unless you cancel with less then two weeks notice as we have already by this time committed to all the anesthesia and OR personnel and have to pay them for your surgery that was scheduled. So a small percentage is retained if cancellation is with to short of a notice as we are charged from those professionals for scheduling them. Even with that being said if someone cancelled because of illness even if it is the day of surgery typically that money is left on the account to be applied to their surgery in the future. We do everything we can to help patients as well as try to make the cost of surgery affordable to everyone.

Dr Hedden

name: Crystal Barnett
text: Dr. Hedden did my BA April of 2016 I had it done through my belly button I had a few problems going into the surgery as far as my breast was not symmetrical as well as they were tubular in shape so he wanted me to have realistic expectations I would not have the perfect breast that I wanted but let me just say I believe he was impressed with how beautiful they actually turned out I still like a little bit on the final results I ended up having to wear a shoelace cast for like 6 weeks after the surgery because of my folds being off quite a bit due to my breast not being symmetrical to start with I hated that thing it wasn't very comfortable at all but I can honestly say this it works and  if you do exactly what he tells you to do during the recovery process and stick to it no matter how uncomfortable it is to wear the shoelace cast  you will achieve great results!!! Dr. Hedden is the best and very skilled at what he does!!!!!

name: Belinda Carroll
text: First off I'd like to say I'm very Happy with my surgery and Dr. Schaffer. He did a wonderful job. I'm not happy with his office staff. They often don't return messages. It's like the right hand doesn't know what the left is doing. You can call today ask a question, you don't get a call back so you wait a couple of days and call, a different person looks at your message and it's not what you asked at the start. If you want a good plastic surgeon he's your guy. If you expect good communication with staff, not so good.

name: Erica Cleveland
text: One of the worst experiences I've ever had with a medical professional . Dr.Hedden at my consult seemed nice enough it was a bit of a wait but he apologized for it no biggie or so I thought . I must admit that they do tell you that you probably won't go back immediately you will have some wait. Well I was coming from out of town my surgery was to be at 9:30 am I didn't get called back until 12:20. I had asked what was taking so long as I was paying for a caretaker by the hour and hadn't eaten the night before, I asked the Dr. personally about it he said sorry but sometimes in surgery things happen it shouldn't be much longer he seemed to get agitated but still professional offered me a refund I stated no since I had waited over 3 hours by this time please proceed as soon as possible. While another hour and 30 minutes go by with me in this thin bathroom no nurse or anything comes to check on me I put my clothes back on and ask the lady at the front how much longer she states she didn't know and she went and found someone. By this time I go back to my room then comes in Patrick who was very nice and was going to start my IV, they called him out of the room then comes in Nurse Manager Win (Nguyen ). She states how can we make you happy I'm like at this point just get my arm surgery started and I'm happy I told her I was fine I just wanted to get it over with since I have come all this way. She states I dont think we can make you happy you're going to give the practice a "bad review" I said I am about the lack of communication but I can't say anything about surgery. I was like I'm over it I just want to get my arm lift done so I can go home. She basically said they didn't want to do it because I complained about the wait time. Who or what person taught these people business etiquette I wasn't loud I just stated that I would be giving a review to let people know how they treat their patients. I stated again I'm fine she extended a discount on cool sculpting I accepted I thought everything was fine. Dr. Hedden comes in very very nasty and stated we're not doing your surgery and we're giving you a full refund and I told him I was fine I wasn't happy but not angry enough not to have my surgery after I have waited over 5 hours he storms out wouldn't hear it. They didn't give me a on refund on my travel or hotel, informed the spa not to do my cool sculpting, and also would not honor a gift certificate that I was given. I wasn't all smiles and giggles, but I didn't get loud or curse. The staff couldn't believe it and said they had never heard of such. Please don't go there Dr. Hedden is a bully and don't dare ask to question why you are waiting or you too could be out of money and time beware stay away awful !!!!

resp.text: We always try to do everything to accommodate patient's. What happened in this case which she is not disclosing is that she requested a late arrival time. She was told in doing that she could not be given an exact start time but that she would be following other cases. She expressed that she was upset about the wait when she first arrived. Our office manager offered her and her care giver a free spa service for the inconvenience. She seemed to be happy at that point. When she was brought back I explained we were sorry for any delay but that when someone ask for a delayed start time that it becomes more dependent on the cases before them which are not something that can be predicted. She then explained she was upset that she was paying for a sitter she hired and was having to pay her. I explained we would pay for the sitters time for her delay. Again she seemed happy with that. She then told the nurse that she also wanted some other procedures for free or she would write a bad review if she was not given them. She had voiced this to several staff members. I then went back into the room and told her I did not feel comfortable operating on someone who was blackmailing the practice in an attempt to get procedures for free. That this was not the right way to start a doctor patient relationship and that we would offer her a full refund and cover her sitter for any inconvenience but that I could not proceed now that threats were made in an attempt to get more free services when we had already tried to do so much for her. She then went up to the spa and asked for monetary exchange for the free spa services we had just given her. We always do everything we can to help our patients and do whatever we can to make their experience as nice as possible but this was not our fault. There is a reason we are one of the busiest practices in the country and it's because we do great work and take care of our patients. We treat everyone as if they were family. But a doctor can not operate on someone when the physician patient relationship breaks down as it did here with her attempts to blackmail the practice.

text: Dr. Hedden is the BEST surgeon in the US. He does a great job on surgeries and is very kind. You can go to him for any plastic surgery!!! I cut my leg going up an escalator and he put some kind of glue in it and it got better in the next week!!!

name: Glenda Tippett
text: If I could give a 0 I would. I had the plastic surgery from hell with Dr Hedden. I would NEVER recommend him for anything. They were 5 hours behind the day I got my surgery. I went almost two days without food or water. When I went back to have the IV put in, because I was so dehydrated it took two different people to stick me about 12 times. Finally got back and they stuck me in the supply closet/room where all the implants was. I was like what the heck. I should have walked out. I told the anesthesia to please give me something for nausea before they woke me up, due to I will start thowing up. I woke up in a wheelchair, at my car, 8pm at night, throw up bowl and throwing my guts up. The anesthesia basically said okay to my husband and took the wheelchair and took off. I felt like I had been hit by a train. I thought I was truly going to die that night.  I was sick and hurt for days. When I went back I was so extremely disappointed in my upper and lower eye lift. Dr Hedden was like, oh well that’s all I can do. Long story short, breast augmentation drop huge in 2 years, I had them removed by another surgeon. The other surgeon also told me Dr Hedden did not remove the fatty tissue in my lower eyelid, so that’s why I still had sagging. I was also told Dr Hedden’s office was known for breast implants in and out, in and out. Trust me, you get what you pay for.  Go to a better surgeon!!! That was a waste and two years to pay off $7,000.00.

resp.text: We have searched through our system and there is no patient by this name. I personally checked every Glenda as well as the one and only Tippett but who has a different first name. I looked at all of those patients charts to see if anyone may have had the surgery this person talks about and no one did. So she most likely has us confused with another practice. I’m going to respond to this review though just to give some clarification on our practice and how this could not have happened. First of all no one is ever asked or told to go without food or water for more than 6 hours before their scheduled surgery time. That’s just no safe. Second this person states she was put in a closet. Not really sure what practice could really look like that but ours obviously does not. Anyone reading this can simply take the virtual tour which shows our operating rooms and see that we are probably the nicest surgery center in Alabama and with cardiac size operating rooms. So I really believe she has us confused with another practice. We do all types of cosmetic surgery and are world renowned for all types of cosmetic breast surgery as well. But for the last 15 years I have always charged the same price. I just think that’s doing right by the Patient by trying to make plastic surgery more affordable. But what she put as what she paid is nowhere closed to what we charge for the procedures she states she had. We always remove fat when lid surgery is performed but some fat has to remain around the orbit to cushion and protect the eye. We also have some of the best anesthesia staff in the city and always give patients nausea medication and never have someone leave before their wide awake and able to take care of themselves. Anesthesia does not wheel them to their car. Our recovery nurses help them outside. Lastly I give my cell number to every single patient that comes through our office if someone has a problem I would hope they would actually call the number. I give out my number because I truly do care about all of our patients that’s why I even still make house calls if needed.

text: I had a breast augmentation done on 4-12-19 and im already in LOVE with them. All of the ladies in the office were so nice and made me feel comfortable and dr. Gunn did such an amazing job !!!!! Went from an A cup to a 36DD and they are perfect😍😍😍

name: Jasmine Billups
text: Although my scar looks great my stomach has never been flat after the surgery ...... it down better than it was..... but after research I would have had better results if I had muscle repair........I was told that it was still swollen..... after a couple of years I guess it's still swollen because my results are the same...... it looks better but not flat....

resp.text: I am sorry you are unhappy with your results. We did perform muscle repair. As much as could be performed. Tummy tucks do not treat fatty tissue in and around the intestines or the thickness of fatty tissue to the upper abdomen. We do the best possible for our patients given the anatomy. That is what was done in this case as well. Remember the best tummy tucks are always when we are at the smallest size we can get to prior to surgery. I think it would do you well to come back in and see what can be done for you.

name: Dionne Jones-Holley
text: I am 2 1/2 months post breast reduction surgery. I had a very specific size in mind prior to my consultation. Dr. Schaffer was upfront and honest with me from day one. He let me know what he was able to do without jeopardizing my health. He is very personable and professional.  For this, I'm thankful. There is no callback or wait from the nurses who are very knowledgeable; you speak to someone as soon as you call. The receptionist and insurance/billing staff are kind as well. I love my results and I am also almost pain free in my back and shoulder areas. Thank you Dr. Schaffer!

Donna C.

text: Everyone here was so nice and took very good care of me.

name: S B
text:
Dr. Hedden placed my implants wrong, causing muscle flex deformity and lateral malposition. I have contacted his office serveral times to discuss the issues and was brushed off. I will now be seeking a malprimalpr lawsuit, as the implants have caused more and more pain over the years and made my job as an exotic dancer impossible to perform. I can not even look in the mirror without crying and I suffer a lot of pain. I would not recommend this man to anyone. He acts like he is the best doctor until you have an issues .my deformity issues showed as soon as the swelling was down and I was informed that this was his mistake. I am also suffering CC due to him placing textureed implants when this was not what I was asked for at all. His resolution to this issue was to just remove the inplants he placed, leaving me with scars and saggy breasts. I plan to gather all of the women I have found in online support groups that he has wronged.
Edit*** I am most definitely one of your patients and have the serial numbers on a card to prove that you used a textured Sientra implant on me. When I confronted Dr. Hedden about this and the double bubble within weeks after surgery, he told me that he would remove my implants and not offer any money back or to replace the implants. I wore all support recommended and didn't try to go back to dancing until years after surgery, which I can also prove. I also have records from a plastic surgeon that I saw in Georgia within months after my surgery, who informed me that a doctor should not have used the implants used, neither texture nor size, neither of which Dr. Hedden spoke to me about before or after surgery. All he did waswbrush me off. I have been suffering since surgery and plan to sue if something is not done to make this right, and especially since you are now denying the use of textured implants. Also, I don't have my full name on this site and use a nickname for my own safety.

resp.text:
We tried to find this patient in our system but no one comes up with her name or anything close to it. We also do not use textured implants as the carry a risk of patients developing a form of cancer. So I’m not sure if this is a patient of ours or even a true patient.  But I will try to respond to her issues. We do perform close to a thousand implants each year and do have several patients who are also dancers. I always try to stress this to dancers ..that you must wear very good support during the healing process and reframe from dancing for the first 3-4 weeks. Otherwise your pocket is not healed enough to prevent migration of the implant down and to the side which is the direction the muscle wants to push it. Patients that come in with no droopiness and wanting a good small implant do not have their muscle changed and so most of the time the implant will not shift much. Also going above the muscle would typically not lead to this but patients would be at higher risk for rippling and capsular contracture (CC). But if someone wants either a very large implant or they have severe droopiness then it will lead to some of the inferior pectoral muscle having to be detached to allow the larger implant to fit or the droopiness to be camouflaged. Thus running the risk of lateral drift if the muscles are used too soon such as an exotic dancer going back to work right away and or not wearing support. So it is very important to always follow the guidelines from your surgeon to minimize any risk of complications. We always offer bliss insurance which would cover any cost of fixing any issues as well. So I’m not sure she is a true patient or our patient because she would have most likely obtained this.
Addendum; she called our office yesterday and is using a different name here but she is very mistaken she does not have textured implants. My nurse called the implant company and gave the serial number to them as well. This is not the appropriate placed to discuss these issues as she should come back in and see us but she wishes to slander us and make accusations that are completely wrong. When someone comes in with droopiness , one breast lower than the other and their breast drifting to the sides because of their chest wall you have a few options all of which are always offered to patients. Asymmetry and droopiness.. best treated with a lift with implants ( cost twice as much and leaves scar that not all patients want ) or biplaner breast augmentation ( less cost , less , scaring but carries the risk of feeling the implant at the bottom and slight double bubble) or going above the muscle (requires silicone, higher risk of capsular contracture). If she really wants this to be educational for you she would consent to her pictures being shown which will show where she started and where she was 3 months out and let everyone judge for themselves. Now it’s very easy to seek a second opinion and a doctor not that busy to say ( without even seeing your before pictures) that something was done wrong. You must understand not all doctors offer all options and some have no experience with biplaner approaches. They will be quick to say something was done wrong so they can charge you to be reoperated on. Always be careful of the doctor giving an opinion without seeing your before pictures. Again this is not the best way to discuss your concerns.

name: Tia Napier
text: I had my breast augmentation done on Feb 1,10 by Dr.Hedden. I am absolutely pleases with my results. I went to several different doctors and wasn't comfortable with them performing the surgery.I really wanted a "D" cup but a lot of doctors told me that it wouldn't look right. My current breast size was a small "B" cup. After talking to Dr. Hedden he said that would actually work for me. When i got my implants they inserted 400cc. I live in Atlanta and drove to Birmingham to have my consulatation and surgery. The entire staff was very professional and I would recommend him 100%. If I need anything else trust me I will be back...Thanks Dr. Hedden!!!!!

text: Dr Jude LaBarbera and his crew are absolutely amazing! I came in 3 weeks ago for a breast lift with augmentation. I came from out of town so I went with the 3 day plan. First day I had my consultation, the dr really took all the time to help me decide on the size and explain the process. The next morning at 6 am was my surgery, I was very nervous and anxious, but dr Jude and his assistant were so sweet and patient. The next day I had my post op appointment, I don’t really remember very well because of the medication and the anesthesia after effects. But the experience was amazing and I love my results. I would do it all over again. I 100% recommend dr Hedden Plastic Surgery center. It was smooth, easy, Comfortable and I know I can reach out to dr Jude LaBarbera at any time. Thank you!!!!

name: Shauna Nix
text: I have been a patient of DR. Hedden for many years and am always thrilled with my care and results. I had breast augmentation 10 years ago and a breast implant exchange just recently . I will never go anywhere else for my plastic surgery needs!

name: Kristen Tanner
text: Dr. LaBarbera is absolutely incredible.  He performed an augmentation (350cc Saline) and lift on me. I went in to his office begging to "be put back to where I used to be" before having two children. He listened to me, took the time to show me pictures, and ask what I was comfortable with. The entire time before, during, and after the surgery he made me feel so comfortable. He was always a text or phone call away if I had the slightest bit of worry about my operation. I just finished my two month appointment and I could not be more amazed! I look exactly like I used to before having kids. I cried at my before and after pictures because it's like the man read my mind!! I had to take my two year old and one year old with me to my last appointment because I couldn't find anyone to keep them and he even took the time to play around with them and make them feel comfortable as well. He even held my one year old while I was getting dressed. Dr. LaBarbera is nothing short of amazing. If you're looking for an awesome plastic surgeon who ginuenly cares about your well being and will give you exactly what you've dreamed of he's your guy! I couldn't sing his praises enough!

I highly recommend Dr. Schaffer if you are considering plastic surgery or other procedures.I have enjoyed my experience at Hedden Plastic Surgery!

name: sandy nguyen
text:
I am very disappointed about my smart lipo result done at Heden Plastic surgery one month ago. My back look exactly how it was before the surgery. It is norm and sensitive. I went in for a follow-up up yesterday. Dr. Gunn who did my surgery told me that how it looked now would be how the final result would be. I took a picture of my back today. I wish I know how to post it here so people can see it. It's a waste of money and time, a painful lesson.
This is my 6 months updates: i see a little improvement but overall my back is still fat. I still see rolls along my back as it was. I have not gained or lose any weight. I guess I was not a good candidate for this procedure and wished doctors ar Heden let me know the truth and gave me a better option than just did the smart lipo which cost me almost six thousand dollars and a lot of pain

name: Lindsey Pope
text: My experience with Dr. Hedden was the best! I had a breast augmentation in July of 2012 and it was okay. I did 290cc of saline I can't say anything bad about that surgeon. I just wanted an upgrade I wanted them bigger and I wanted silicone! I had a friend that went to dr. Hedden and she was very pleased with him, so I decided I scheduled a consultation with him it took me about 2 months to get a consultation. I was in the office for probably 15 mins before I was called into a room to see dr. Hedden! Me and my boyfriend played around with the samples while we waited to see what size we liked. I was kinda hard for me to tell what it would look like since I already had implants. Originally I was wanting to go to a 450! But me and my boyfriend continued to talk about it and said we really couldn't even tell a difference so we picked 500 (he wanted me to go a lot bigger being a male of course) but I researched and researched females my size and 500 cc of silicone gel, and I truly liked the size and I felt those would look best! My consultation was July the 14th and that day we scheduled the surgery for august the 10th. My surgery was scheduled for 8 I got back in the room about 9 around 10 the took me back for surgery. I remember waking up around 12:15 and I left at 12:30, I ended up getting 525cc silicone gel! It was a super easy process. I felt like everything was done in a timely manor. I stayed the night the night of my surgery and had to follow up post op day one, while I was there I got some juvaderm injections in my lips! It was pretty painful but I have to say I absolutely love them! They a beautiful I've received so many compliments on my lips! I'm now post op day 5 I can pretty much do anything I'm still a little sore! I will return to work Friday and I can't wait to show off my lips! I highly recommend dr. Hedden and his facility. He truly listens to you and your concerns. He puts his patients first. The staff is awesome as well, they make you feel at home. And the anesthesiologist was great to! The day after I got home I had a get well soon card from his facility which was super kind. If I could do it all over again I wouldn't change one thing! In my opinion Dr. hedden in the BEST plastic surgery!

name: Stephanie Jones
text: Great doctors, everyone seemed nice!

text: Dr. Schaffer and his staff are absolutely amazing! I had breast augmentation on April 14th 2017.  Over the past month Dr. Schaffer and his staff have taken very good care of me. I had some issues that were unexpected, unplanned for and were not anyone's fault, my body just didn't want to cooperate! In my eyes Dr. Schaffer and his staff have went above and beyond for me and for that I greatly appreciate them!  I would highly recommend him to anyone that asks!! Thanks Dr. Schaffer and staff at Hedden Plastic Surgery!!!

name: Charmonika Smith
text: I went in for a consultation for a breast reduction and my information was never submitted to my insurance company. the only thing I recorded after I left there was a bill in the mail.

resp.text: I'm sorry you are upset with our practice. When patient's present for evaluation for breast reductions information is only sent to the insurance company if the patient anatomy meets the criteria based on our exam and measurements. I know sometimes the insurance company will tell the patient all they need is a letter stating its necessary and then it will be covered. But that is not the case, they require the doctor to make sure it meets the requirements or they will not approve it. We always try to explain this to every patient so they understand the process. I am sorry she felt we let her down. I think it would be worse to get your hopes up that it would be covered when we know from experience it will not based on your anatomy.

text: My wife and I have been to see Dr. Proffitt many times. I get Botox injections, and always have a good experience both with the staff and Dr. Proffitt. The Botox always seems to last longer than Botox I've received elsewhere. My wife is planning on having surgery with Dr. Proffitt for a mommy makeover.

name: S L
text: I visited Dr. Proffitt's office for a consultation on a procedure that I had called to get information on. The staff could not give me information and insisted I come in for a consultation. I was not informed that there would be a charge for this. After arriving, I was told there was a charge .. at this time I did not even know if he could do this procedure and was hesitant to pay the fee to be told that no, he could not do it. I did however and was led into a room to watch a video on eye surgery, which is not what I had come in for.  At this time I just had a bad feeling and did not feel comfortable. I did not see any literature on the procedure I was interested in. I informed the office staff that I had changed my mind and did not want to see the doctor. They were somewhat rude and said that I would have to call the office manger (Jeannie Proffitt) to get a refund because she was not in. When I did call her, she was very rude, unprofessional and said she would not issue a refund even though I did not see the doctor.  Luckily I paid with my credit card and called them to inform them of the situation, so it was charged back to them. I did make an appointment with a doctor in Pensacola who does do the procedure I wanted. Do NOT put yourself through a bad experience with this doctor!!!!!! Very bad customer relations to say the least.

name: Lynn Gomez
text: When I went to see Dr. Proffitt about my tummy tuck, I was surprised on how affordable the procedure was. He answered my questions, and told me what I can expect from him. While preparing for the procedure, I called many times with questions, and the staff was always eager to help me. Not only was my procedure a success, it was better, and easier than I thought. After the procedure, several small issues concerned me. Dr. Proffitt and his staff always took care of me immediately. I was never made to feel silly for the things I was concerned about. He always greeted me with a warm smile, and made me feel at ease. His staff knew me and greeted me like family.

name: Glen and Tricia Perry
text: I had a medical procedure performed by Dr. Proffitt.  Very professional.  Staff was very kind and accommodating.  I was very pleased with the results and recommend Dr. Proffitt for your medical and cosmetic procedures.

name: Sharon Bishop
text: With breast augmentation when did it become acceptable practice to leave a patient with a huge disfiguring hematoma? This leaves the patient with one breast larger than the other, an unnatural look and feel. Because of the hematoma it also stretched and scarred my nipple. Proffit used the wrong size implant on the left side even though we consulted on size before surgery. He placed the implant so far under my armpit it is diffcult to shave and embarrassing to wear sleeveless tops because of the excess skin. On the right side he gave me a hollowed out hole  with a different type implant that is also badly placed. This is not what we had decided on during the consult. He has not learned to put in the gel implants without giving his patients a hematoma. I am not the first.  During my surgery I also had Juvederm around my mouth, he only did one side of my mouth. This was distrubing! I guess he forgot to do the other side. With the 38 years of experience you would think he would be better skilled and have some regard to his patients out come and his reputation. I paid $5,000 for this surgery without insurance. I pleaded with him to fix the hematoma. He wanted to charge me $3,000 to fix the hematoma he gave me.  I feel I was cheated and wronged.

name: Reba P.
text: I recently visited Dr. Proffitt's office to get Botox done.  I get a little squemish around needles so I was pretty nervous.  Once the nurse and office manager (Sara and Jeanne) found that out that were very understanding.  They offered me a sprite made sure there was an ice pack ready for afterwards and stayed with me while he injected me.  I hardly felt anything it was so nice to be treated that way since in the past most doctors haven't really cared that I don't like needles. This was just the opposite as soon as  Dr. Proffitt entered the room they told him that about the situation and he said he understood one of his own daughters hates needles.  He listened to exactly where I wanted my wrinkles to disappear told me where he would inject the Botox to help with that, made sure I was ready and then did the procedure.  It took less than ten minutes.  Jeanne and Sara made sure I was feeling alright and then I was on my way.  I will be going to Dr. Proffitt for all my future procedures this was the best experience I've ever had at a doctors office

name: Jonathan Dearman
text: Arrived early for my appointment and waited 2 hours after the appointment time to even be seen.

name: Shelina Bertrand
text:
Dear Dr. Koehler,
You saved my life that day I sat in your office crying because I had to undress for this appointment.  You had the most kind and generous heart in that moment but you gave me great advice that I took. I came into your office broken and secluded because I didn’t recognize myself. You said,  “go talk to a doctor about the sleeve /weight loss surgery then come back and see me.”Best decision I’ve ever made, I just couldn’t do it any other way.  80lbs later, I am healthier and happier for it.  Then I came back and you did your magic makeover on me. You took all that skin and snatched it back even better than I was before including my scratch marks from 2 children. You sculpting my waistline like I had been in the gym all my days. My breast lift looks like Im a 20 years old again.  You absolutely did an amazing job and gave me back my confidence and my active life with my family again.  The only downside is I am happily married and have to fight the guys off daily now.  One gentleman who was 55 years old, asked how old I was and I said your age. He continued to say, women don’t look like you at our age because he had been looking for a while.  I didn’t share my secret, I just said thank you. But he kept saying wow you are beautiful so maybe I should have.  Needless to say it is a good thing I love myself, my husband and GOD.  Yes, my husband loves my new body also but he is more excited that I will  come Jet-skiing with him now and I’m back at the beach again feeling confident.  Thanks too you and your wonderful staff for taking good care of me every step of the way.   Forever grateful ......Blessings to you

name: Kaylyn Ingram
text: I went to Eastern Shore Cosmetic Surgery to receive a hydra facial and it was amazing! The experience was very relaxing, the environment was beautiful, and Brittany Lee was incredible! She was so sweet and informative about all the steps we took during the facial. I will definitely be back. Thank you!

name: Alisande
text:
I am so glad I found Dr. Koehler.
The office is on a private enclosed area offering peace and privacy. It feels more like a Spanish Pueblo getaway with its opulence and beautifully
flowered landscapes.
The staff is jovial and mindful of you and it truly is genuine.
Denvia was superb and helping me understand this process and turned the difficult decision of remove my implants into a much needed goal and accomplishment.. The nurses and anesthesiologist were so very attentive that my anxiety with this procedure was close to nothing. I already referred two girlfriends before coming based on my dealings with Denvia and what I read on several review site. I thank Dr. Koehler and Co. Truly happy with this choice.

name: Karonda Lee
text: I recently had my consultation back in September 2020. We were preparing for a major hurricane at this time. Doctor Koehler and his staff knew how important me keeping my appointment was. Due to the pandemic, I let my previous consultation results expire.(Round 2 Consultation) They reached out and asked if I could come in earlier before the weather got bad, and I said of course!! To see all of their smiling faces, hear the smiles in their voice and also the warm welcome was just the start of it all. Dr. Koehler was very confident in what he could do for me, and that is give me the flat tummy and waistline that I desire. December  2020 is my surgery date! I absolutely recommend Eastern Shore Cosmetics and it’s Staff along with Dr. Koehler to anyone, and this is before Surgery!! So I can confidently say that I would recommend afterwards as well:-)

name: Kathy Barnard
text:
Dr. Koehler and his entire staff are fantastic.  I had a face lift several months ago and my family could not tell it.  I had no problems and recovered well.
I would recommend him for any type of surgery or procedures.  He is the  best.  KB
