Who knew the best would be in Alabama of all places and trust me I travel a lot. He knows what he’s doing and you can totally tell he’s confident in what he’s saying to you and he’s not just blowing smoke. My results were well beyond what I expected. I’m so happy I found my guy.

name: Tara
text: Dr. Koehler are fantastic. The entire staff is so kind, great at explaining things, and putting patients at ease. The office is beautiful and they do a fantastic job here!

name: rachel mims
text: I didn't have my procedure done here but Dr. Koehler was very pleasant and informative. He wasn't confident he could give me the results I want, the way I want. So he didn't waste my time. He was more interested in my happiness than my money which is a rarity these days!

name: Laura Jeanne
text: Dr. Koehler and his entire staff are absolutely fantastic ! Special shout out to Denva Who was extremely patient with me and has a wonderful personality. Top-notch professional friendly courteous and understanding I couldn’t be happier with the results of my surgery Thank you so much.Don’t bother looking anywhere else the best is right here (Dr.Koehler)😁

name: Maria Williamson
text: Dr. Koehler is amazing!! I recently had a complete nose reconstruction with a bone graph from my skull. His confidence and knowledge of the procedure made me feel at ease with having such an complicated surgery done. The bedside manners of Dr. Koehler and his staff are professional and courteous. I read his reviews before I made an appointment with him and I was NOT disappointed. I highly recommend him to anyone who is interested in cosmetic surgery.

name: Jessica Ganey
text: Dr Koehler is simply amazing! He truly helps people restore confidence in there self. His staff is so sweet and they go above to make sure you are well takin care of. I’ve never felt comfortable in my own skin until now and I can’t thank Dr Koehler and his team enough for everything they have done.

name: Christine Harrington
text: Excellent place !!!

name: Calebjenni Hunt
text: I traveled to see Dr. Koehler. It was worth every single mile and I would do it again without hesitation. Every single staff member is top notch. If I could give above the five-star rating, I certainly would. The expertise, the care, the fantastic results, and bedside manner is beyond five-star service. I was a tough case, and I knew I had to find the best. Dr. Koehler came highly recommend, and I see why! Dr. Kohler did an amazing job. My family and I were treated with such care. Everything was explained in great detail. I would not go anywhere else if I ever needed surgery again. Thank you to everyone at Eastern Shore. You all are amazing. I am so happy with my choice to see you!

name: Marie Diane
text: After having received services I was told I now need to make a deposit.  Bad business!

resp.text:
Hi Marie,

While Injectable appointments do not require a consultation fee, we charge $75 for surgical consultations with Dr. Koehler. Surgery and certain other services do require a deposit before the procedure. These are standard practices among cosmetic surgeons across the country, but we apologize if you were surprised to learn about our policies. We are happy to answer basic questions and provide general pricing information over the phone without charge.

Dr. Koehler

name: Tricia Niemeyer
text:
The decision to under go cosmetic surgery is a process.. not something you wake up and make a phone call to schedule as if it was a haircut.
I deliberated for quite sometime and began hearing good things about Dr. Koehler and then I noticed some of the faces to go along with the comments I was hearing.  These were people that looked rested, younger and felt good about themselves, which was exactly my reason for considering surgery.  Dr. Koehler was  just amazing to work with, he was  honest about results, professional and absolutely a magician.  I could go on and on, but suffice it to say that if you are considering cosmetic surgery go see Dr. Koehler.

name: Shannon Taylor
text: I wanted a mommy makeover for many years and finally brought myself to do it this year. I’m a week out from surgery and honestly feel pretty good. The staff and Dr. Oliver made me feel so welcome and like a human being. I consulted with 6 other surgeons before I chose him and I’m so happy I did. They just don’t know how this has changed my life. You won’t find a more kind and attentive group of people from reception to surgeon.

name: Angela Taylor
text: I was very thankful that Dr. Rob Oliver was recommended by my Primary Physician. I had surgery on July 20th and my tubes were removed on that Monday July 26th. I am very pleased on the outcome of my surgery and the results. And thank you for the kindness of your Staff as well❤💕🤗

name: Deb Hammack
text: Dr Oliver has helped make a very difficult time in my life easier. Excellent medical care.

name: Yolanda Jones
text: Dr. Robert Oliver is an outstanding plastic surgeon.  He is providing plan for me that is working in my best interest.  If you looking for an experienced plastic surgeon he is highly recommended, you will be completely satisfied!!!!

name: Zeena Thomas
text: It was a very easy process working with Dr. Oliver and his staff.  Whether I called or emailed, they were quick to respond.  I had made a decision to have my implants removed and he did a great job, not even necessary to go in for a lift.  I would not hesitate to refer him.

name: Malerie Colbert
text: Dr Oliver is amazing! I was recommended to him by a friend and he did a great job on both of our surgeries! Very nice and explains everything well!

name: Haylee Sisson
text: Dr Oliver Jr is the most compassionate, awesome Plastic Surgeons ever!!! And his staff are just wonderful. I would trust him for myself and my family and I don’t just put my life or my family life in just anyone’s hands but I do highly recommend them.  Love these guys!!!

name: Cindy Snyder
text: Dr. Oliver and his staff ard very caring and attentive. Always professional.

name: Samantha Robinson
text: I am happy to share with you that Dr. Oliver did an excellent job on my tummy tuck. I have always wanted to have a flat tummy and with his help I now have it. I am very satisfied!!!

name: paige priestley
text: Dr. Robert Oliver is the best.

name: Lauren Battles
text: The staff is amazing! Dr. Oliver is very professional and makes you feel safe and confident in his abilities. I am two weeks post operative and I love my results already. I feel confident for the first time in years. My results are natural and better than I could of ever dreamed. If I ever have another cosmetic procedure I will definitely be back.

name: Tonya Jones
text: Very friendly office. Dr Oliver done a great job on my breast implant change.  Highly recommend.

name: Nikki Walters
text: I went to Dr. Oliver & Dr. Jack to try their EMSculpt and I must say the staff and both Dr.'s were fabulous. They were very respectful and knowledgable about their products and services which made me extremely comfortable with this non-surgical procedure. I am ecstatic  with the results thus far!

name: ANGELA JUSTICE
text: Dr. Oliver and his entire staff have been extremely kind and professional during my surgeries for breast cancer and reconstruction.  I would highly recommend this practice.

name: Elizabeth Payne
text: Love Dr. Oliver and the entire staff!

name: Jaquelyn Lear
text: Very happy with Dr Feagin and my results. He did exactly what I wanted. The office staff (i am not sure who exactly) was a little short and seemed aggravated when I called a couple of times. I was honestly a little shocked because this office has such a great reputation. However, I am still giving 5 stars because the surgeon himself is wonderful. I am planning another consult with him soon for a different surgery. I do recommend him for any cosmetic needs!

name: Brittany Harrison
text: Dr Owen was very professional and nice. He never made me feel uncomfortable or made me feel like he didn’t care. He was very thorough in explaining the process to me and was very patient in answering all of my questions. After surgery when I was a worry wort he always stayed patient with me during the many phone calls of questions and check ups. I was a triple D 5ft 180 and he brought me down to C/D which makes me look way smaller and proportionate. I have NEVER felt so pretty and good about myself. It was an over all great experience for me. He is a wonderful Doctor!

name: Justine Boyce
text:
I COULDN’T HAVE PICKED A BETTER DR!!
Dr. Owen is the pro of all pros. He made the process so stress free and was extremely thorough with the details. I was SO nervous  because never been in a hospital for any reason except to visit so this was all very new.. BUT I would do this all over again. I really couldn’t have asked for anything better. I’m EXTREMELY HAPPY  with my results. And if I decide to have anything else done, I know exactly who to call.
Thank you Dr.Owen and Olivia! You guys are absolutely awesome!

name: Olivia Woodham
text: Dr. Owens did an amazing job with my procedure. Natural look, very thorough, and made sure I was taken care from the first consult to my last check up! Highly recommend this office for any plastic surgery needs in the Dothan area.

name: norma
text:
Dr. Feagin and his team are great!  I highly recommend him if you’re considering breast reduction surgery.  I must say I was nervous about having the surgery but Dr. Feagin’s professionalism and compassion quickly put me at ease.  I had many questions, and he never hurried me through them.  He is such a kind, patient and understanding physician!

I decided to see Dr. Feagin because I’ve suffered with chronic neck and shoulder
pain for several years which has only worsened with age.  I’m in my 50’s now (!post-menopausal!) and really wanted relief!!  He assured me this would help -WHICH IT DID!  And as a bonus, my insurance helped take care of it.

A couple of months out from surgery and feeling great!  This is certainly a procedure I wish I had done years ago. Thanks Dr. Feagin, Hilary and Flowers Hospital Surgery Team!

name: Theresa Moulton
text: Dr. Owens is a very professional meticulous doctor,he takes great pride in doing excellent work. He preformed a breast lift and lower face lift on me , and I can tell you I am enjoying my beautiful more youthful face and breasts. Thank you so much Dr. Owens!

resp.text: Thank you so much for entrusting Dr. Owens with your surgery!  He really is meticulous and a true artist.

name: Madie Ard
text: Dr. Feagin and his staff made me feel as comfortable as possible. He did an amazing job with my procedure and has made sure I've done well post-op. The people are so kind, and I highly recommend booking an appointment with him!

name: Alyssa Davis
text: Dr Feagin and his staff is truly amazing. Dr Feagin has a wonderful bedside manner. I am very pleased with my results. I came to him in June wanting breast augmentation and had surgery in July 2020.  I was very self conscious with my breast, and I was very asymmetrical. I am now 2 months post surgery and I love my results and feel confident in my own skin! I highly recommend Dr Feagin!

name: JEFF WILLIAMS
text: Dr . Feagin performed an upper eyelid bleph on me. Same day procedure and I’ve had zero pain, even on the day of surgery. Even though he removed a lot of tissue, I’ve had very little redness and just a little swelling. I couldn’t be happier with the results, even better than expected. His staff, especially Yvette, were true professionals. I highly recommend Dr. Feagin for amazing results.

name: Laura White
text: Dr Feagin nearly killed me. He did a breast reconstruction on me after a double mastectomy. The result looked awful.  I kept getting fluid on my abdomen and had to go to the office to get it drained. I developed MRSA and spent a week in the hospital. Then the implant on the left dropped into my abdomen. I tried to tell Dr Feagin my implant was missing but he said it was impossible. He sent me in for a X-ray to place a drain. They found the implant in my abdomen. I developed MRSA again. I spent Christmas in the hospital. I had to go to wound care and IV therapy for weeks.  Dr Feagin was cold and uncaring and acted like it was my fault.  He also did breast surgery on my sister.  She developed MRSA and had to be hospitalized. Stay away from this doctor. He is dangerous.

resp.text: Ms. White, we have pulled your medical file and reviewed your surgery with us back in 2005.  We are unsure why you haven’t contacted us to discuss any ongoing concerns or dissatisfaction from your results.  We are always available to discuss any patient needs - give us a call at 334-793-7211

name: Katrell Cowart
text: The bedside manners was excellent. It was encouraging the staff was amazing and very helpful. Would recommend  service. Explained the procedure well and you knew what was going on before and after. Very happy with the results although I'm still healing, the process was worth it. Dr. Feagin was great.

name: Kaitlyn Taylor
text:
Dr. Owen was so professional and made me feel comfortable talking to him about any questions I had. I am a 23-year-old 150lb female whose breast was a 32 J and he took me down to a c/d (I haven't been professionally measured). I have absolutely no complaints, and I even kept sensation in one breast! My scars are barely noticeable (I was worried) and he gave me the perfect size for my body type with NO BACK PAIN. My fingers used to go numb from the weight of my breast, and that hasn't happened since before the surgery. I would absolutely recommend Dr. Owen to any person wanting any procedure, but especially to anyone wanting or needing a breast reduction.

I had 3 appointments before the surgery to answer any questions or concerns as well as 3 post-surgery to keep up with my recovery. He did an Anchor incision. His staff  was also the absolute best, one woman even prayed over me when I was freaking out. I genuinely could not have had a better experience.

name: Jennifer Martin
text: I have to say this was a truly amazing experience from start to finish. I have never had surgery in my life and this was better than I ever expected. There were no complications, no scaring, and most importantly no pain what so ever after my surgery. I was back to work 2 days after. Dr. Feagin is the best plastic surgeon in the region for a reason. You have absolutely nothing to be concerned about and you are in very good hands.  Listen to all instructions he gives for before and after surgery. I'm so incredibly happy, thank you so much Dr. Feagin!!!

name: Brandy Hammond
text: My first surgical experience ever was amazing. Dr. Feagin is phenomenal his staff is amazing. I’m 6weeks post op and from start to finish I had no complications, no pain, I had no need for the pain medication that was prescribed, I had surgery on a Wednesday afternoon was back at work Friday morning. I went in with a list of questions and before I could ask he answered literally every one. I highly recommend Dr. Feagin my BA scar is minimal, he gave me exactly what I asked for fuller and natural. I’m very pleased. Do follow all his instructions from start to finish and I guarantee you will be just as happy with the outcome.

name: Lakesha Snell
text: I went in for a consultation for a breast reduction with Dr. Feagin in June. I was approved the same day and set a July surgery date. It is three months out from surgery and can say it was the best decision I ever made. My backaches and headaches are gone and I no longer have numbness in my hands. The staff is wonderful!! They addressed any of my concerns and were supportive the whole way. It is a ROUGH surgery but you will feel so much better in the end. He removed 4lbs from each breast it made a huge difference😊

name: Shelia Hughes
text: Dr. Owen was amazing.  Never rushed, always answered the phone, if I had questions or issues they always seen me quickly, I never had to wait long sometimes I never had to even sit in waiting room at all.  His work is incredible I was nervous about it but it looks amazing and I’m only two weeks out and scarring already doesn’t even look bad.  I highly highly recommend.

name: katrina arnaud
text: From the very first phone call I had an awesum interaction with the staff of dr. owen and the hospitality only got better as we planned this life changing decision. I would recommend dr owen and his staff to anyone i know first class treatment and also the nurses at flowers outpatient surgery they were on top of there game and made me feel so comfotable

name: Jenny Reeves
text: At my first meeting with Dr. Owen and his staff, I felt very comfortable. Dr. Owen is straight forward, professional and caring. Every question I had was answered professionally and advice was given as well. My surgery and follow-up visits were all met with the same care and concern as the initial consultation.  I would highly recommend Dr. Owen, I am very pleased with the outcome! THANK YOU!

name: Karen Raines
text: Dr. Owen is wonderful and does amazing work!

name: Audrey Straub
text: Dr.Feagin did an amazing job. Everyone in this office was extremely kind. They took great care of me. I feel like this surgery changed my life.

name: Tammy Pfalzgraff
text: Dr. Owen and staff are amazing.  From the very first visit for a consult I felt this was the surgeon for me!  He answered every question in depth, covered all aspects of the procedure and was honest about results and recovery.  I never felt rushed.  Staff is wonderful...friendly, warm and inviting.  Surgical team at Flowers were top notch.  I cannot say enough good things about Dr. Owen, staff and surgery at Flowers.  This is a very personal decision for you to make and I know I made the right decision for me. Excellent all the way around!

name: Joni Phelps
text: From day one of my consultation, I knew Dr. Owen was the one, the Best possible Surgeon for me.  He is kind, honest, professional, and most of all he genuinely cares about his patients and their outcomes, they are not just another surgery for him.  When he makes a promise to follow you through to the end of your journey, he means it, no matter how long and hard that journey may be.  There just is no amount of praise good enough that I could say to describe Dr. Owen and his wonderful staff!  Thank you from the bottom of my heart!!!!

name: Dawn Barley
text: I used Dr Owen. This is one hateful man. You do what he wants and better not complain. I had a tummy tuck by him and he cut two deep grooves in my hips and swears it is my waist. You can’t argue and say, “No, you put two deep grooves in my hips and I can’t wear any pants or shorts because they fall to this groove in my hips. By the way they are also crooked. One groove is higher than the other. I’m shaped like a man and it’s like being two different people. I hate what he done to me and I’m not the only one. Met a woman on another site that hates what he done to her too!!!

name: Elizabeth Johnson
text: Wonderful experience with Dr. Owen and staff.  I have had two different cosmetic procedures with him over the years and am very pleased with the results.  I would highly recommend him to anyone!

name: Lora Wood
text: I first would like to say Dr. Owen and staff are the best.  In the beginning of my journey I went for a consultation to a plastic surgeon in Panama City, Florida and I must say it was the most uncomfortable appointment I had ever been to.  They would not even try to get my insurance approved for a breast reduction that I desperately needed for medical reasons.  About a year later I ended up at my Neurosurgeons office in Dothan, Alabama and he highly recommended Dr. Owen.  At my first visit I was very comfortable.  The office worked diligently at getting my insurance approved.  The insurance was a success and so was my surgery.  I am now about 3 months out and everything went great and I feel so much better!  Thank you to Dr. Owen and his great staff!

name: Georgia Catron
text: I would like to thank Dr. Owen for doing such an amazing job on my daughter breast reduction surgery!!! The result where so much better than we expected or envisioned. Dr. Owen and his team were extremely professional. Dr. Owen looked after her every step of the way keeping us well informed during her pre and post appointments. Dr. Owen was very caring, respectful, and also informative. Every time we went in for follow ups we never felt rushed, our questions were always answered to our satisfaction and most of all Dr. Owen was always reassuring and his staff always treated us with respect and never made her feel uncomfortable.  My daughter lived all of her teenage years being uncomfortable and in pain in her neck and back because of her large breasts. She was very insecure about her breast. She hated wearing swimsuits and certain clothes because of the way her breast looked. Now, She is more confident in her walk and she feel so much better overall! She loves the way her t-shirts and tanks fit.  Now she can look in the mirror and feeling great about herself! I would definitely recommend Dr. Owen at Feagin and Owen Cosmetic Plastic Surgery Center!!!!

name: Amanda Watson
text: Dr.Feagin did a great job!  I went from completely flat with hardly any breast tissue and he gave me a wonderful natural looking B that fits my body perfect!  I can now wear clothes and tank tops with confidence!  I especially am enjoying being able to wear a bikini.  The staff is great and friendly!  I recommend them to everyone!

name: Diana
text: Dr. Feagin and his staff are the absolute best! They all made me feel completly comfortable and answered any question I had. From consultation, surgery, aftercare and all in between they were caring and supportive. I discussed with Dr. Feagin what I wanted done and what I wanted to look like. I put my trust completely in his hands, and I am so glad I did! His work is amazing and I am very happy with my surgery.

name: Jessica Thompson
text: Dr. Feagin helped me transform my body after losing 130 lbs. I had the full belt tummy tuck, brachioplasty and fat grafts to the buttocks. I'm still amazed at my results. Feel free to contact me personally for photos. I also have a private group of all my procedures from Day 1. You truly have to see it to believe it. He does amazing work. From the first consult, rolling into the OR and all my follow ups, him and his team have been so supportive. I can't thank you all enough.

name: Nassandra Corbitt
text: I actually went to a cosmetic surgeon in Enterprise, Alabama last year. The surgeon in Enterprise botched my tummy tuck up. The best description of my abdomen would be the work of a Kindergartner playing a game of operation...... My stomach was a mess. I went to Dr. Feagin earlier this year and my tummy is absolutely beautiful! He is a certified plastic surgeon and he really did care about my well being. Dr. Feagin was so compassionate towards me and took his time to explain the procedure to me. His staff is amazing and I cannot express my gratitude to Dr. Feagin. He is the best choice!

name: Serene Jacobs
text: I have had to have 2 surgeries with Dr. Feagin. Each time he has gone above and beyond to make me feel comfortable, make sure I understand what he will be doing for my surgery, as well as made sure I knew how to take care of myself during recover. His office staff is so friendly and helpful. I highly recommend Dr. Feagin and his staff for whatever your needs may be.

name: Lisa Mitchell
text: Since having my breast reduction, I have noticed a huge decrease in neck and upper back strain and pain. I still have some trouble with my right shoulder, but most of that is contributed to my career. I feel much better about myself when I look at pictures and in the mirror. Such a simple decision has helped me to become more active and has built my confidence back, like it used to be. I wish more women would consider this surgery..I wish I had done it a few years earlier. My daughter had the same surgery a couple years before me, and I watched a wonderful transformation with her whole demeanor. It made her feel pretty again..all women deserve that!

name: Rhema Rock
text:
May 19, 2019

I am 1000% satisfied with my Breast reduction/augmentation results‼️

Dr. Feagin was my surgeon and I was referred to him by my sister-in-law. I am 49 years old and I have suffered from neck, shoulder and back pain for years. I didn’t realize it was coming from my 34DDD/36DD breast. I wore very good support bras. But I still got indentions on my shoulders from my bra trying to hold up all that weight 🤣. Dr. Feagin removed “1 pound” from EACH of my breast (which is equivalent to 4 sticks of butter). So I can honestly say that I should have had this procedure done YEARS ago. I am 2 weeks and 5 days post op, a size 36C and my breast look amazing.
I haven’t had any neck, shoulder or back pain so I would recommend anyone that’s having the issues that I was having to consult with Dr. Feagin.
He’s the best‼️

name: Lisa Good
text: I’m 44 years old and have recently underwent breast reduction surgery. I have always had very large breast for my frame and felt very subconscious about them. I have also dealt with shoulder indentions and shoulder and neck and back pain from the weight of them along with other struggles from them being to large and heavy. I finally got up the nerve to go to a consultation to see about a breast reduction. I went to see Dr Feagin and immediately knew that he was the right Dr for me! He was very reassuring that I would not be disappointed and that the pain afterward was minimal. I had my surgery on October 3, 2018. I had to have a Nipple graft because of the size and weight of my breasts. I spent the night in the hospital and went home the next day. The recovery process went amazingly well and pain was minimal. I went from a 38E to a 38D and could not be happier with the results! I would recommend Dr Feagin to anyone!

name: carly adams
text: My whole experience I have been highly satisfied, not knowing anything about my procedure they fulfilled me with all information possible needed as well as made me feel welcome and certain that this is what I wanted done etc etc. Dr. Feagin is a wonderful doctor he made sure that not only he was happy with my decision but I would be as well , and after the procedure was done , I will still smiling ,yes I had some questions I was unsure of or curious about however the girls upfront had that all undercover, taking out of there day to personal message me via socaial media as well as email picture to the doctor because I live 2 hours from the office !! Very helpful :) .. even with living little ways away , they make it manageable with scheduling time and paying for the procedure .. I don’t recommend people pay 5 grand more for the same procedure .THEY are AWESOME !! I have recommended several people to this facility and recommend many more make the same decision .

name: Emily Doss
text: Dr Owens is a hateful Dr. He has a BAD  bedside manner. He acts like it’s an inconvenience to be your Dr. Very disappointed.

name: Lenise23
text: I'm a 49 year old women. I have had many surgeries in the past. I was so scared to have another surgery at my age. I got married in March 2018 and i felt  undesirable and self conscience of my "fupa" so i decided in September 2018 to have Belt abdominoplasty(tummy tuck) and a breast reduction 46DD to 36C. Dr Feagin was GREAT. He did an AWESOME  job. I'm very pleased with my new body. The pain was well worth it!!!

name: D T
text: After my child's birth, breast feeding really took a tole on my upper body and I was self conscious of my breasts every since. Dr Feagin was able to lift and reshape them to look more natural rather than droopy without the use of implants! Surgery went well and he was considerate of my opinions and wishes. I healed very fast (complete recovery within 4-6 weeks) after the bilateral breast mastopexy was performed, no sign of infection and was able to return to work within 2-3 days with lifting precautions in place. I am planning to return for an additional procedure within the next 6 months!

name: Steve Kendrick
text: We would highly recommend Dr. William I. Owen of Feagin and Owen. Our son had broken his nose in a sports injury. We took him to see Dr. Owen on a recommendation from a doctor friend.   Dr. Owen was very professional and thoughtful. He truly cared about our son and the process. He did not immediately rush into surgery but suggested we wait several months for the swelling to go down.  He was flexible by working the surgery around our son’s school schedule since he is an out-of-state college student. Dr. Owen explained everything to us, what he would do during the surgery, what we should expect for the first seven days and then after the follow-up visit; it was spot on.  This made us feel at ease because Dr. Owen had done it so many times before, we knew we could trust him.  Dr. Owen is an excellent doctor and we would recommend him for any procedures you may need.

name: carly shiver
text: Dr. Owen is incredible and his staff are so kind. I couldn't ask for a better doctor! From the first consultation to surgery day and post treatment he has been wonderful. He will forever be my go to plastic surgeon.

name: Tina Albritton
text: I had breast reduction in December 2018 with Dr. Feagin and it was the absolute best decision I ever made! I was a 38DDD before surgery and about a 38C post surgery. I was reluctant at first because everyone told me it was painful,  it would leave me with weird shaped breast, etc... that is soo far from the truth.  I have noticed that my neck and back pain is much better, and I love the shape/size of my new breast. Dr. Feagin and his staff are wonderful and treated me very well! I would do it all over again because it is literally a huge weight lifted off my chest!

name: Tara Holcomb
text: I had such an amazing experience with Dr. Feagin and the staff of Feagin and Owen Plastic surgery. Turned out better than i could have ever imagined. They were extremely professional and so kind. Thank you so much!

name: Rachel Nelson
text: Dr. Feagin and his staff are awesome!!!   I tell everyone that Dr. Feagin is a miracle worker.    One of my implants had leaked/deflated after 14 years;  after a nearly 3 year wait, I was finally able to get my implants replaced.   One implant was encapsulated and the breast tissue was very scarred due to me waiting so long to have them redone. I was extremely nervous about the results I would get.    There was no need to worry; Dr. Feagin is my plastic surgeon.   My satisfaction and results are through the roof.   Dr. Feagin does his work in such a way that people are not sure if I have had work done at all.   That's the sign of an extremely talented plastic surgeon!!!

name: Skylah Woodham
text: I highly reccomend Feagin and Owen! They did exactly what I asked them to do! I have never felt better about myself! Well worth every penny! Thank you so much!

name: Stephanie “Steph” Truitt
text: I never imagined that getting stitches and staples removed would be PAINLESS. Hilliary is the best! I am thankful for her patience, knowledge, and ability to distract me while doing so. She's answered countless questions, and covered all of my concerns. I just wish that Dr. Feagin took "after" pictures, and scheduled me a 6-8 week check-up instead of deciding not to see me anymore after my 3 week check-up. Just seemed too early, but he's reassured me to contact his office should any issues arise.

name: Reyna Freeman
text: I am 6 weeks post op from abdominoplasty, flank liposuction, breast augmentation with mastopexy. I chose Dr. Feagin to be my surgeon due to his excellent reputation, many years in practice, previous experience as his patient, and because this was a second abdominoplasty- which could be more challenging and requires expertise to obtain great results. My first abdominoplasty was done in Chicago while I was living there, after having twins. I am extremely happy with these results! Finally, I have a completely flat belly! Also, I was having issues due to my diastasis that are no longer present since my surgery. Like most women who have had a few babies, I used to have a little bladder leakage during coughing, sneezing, or laughing with a full bladder- but not now! Also, no more low back pain and no more heartburn! I had no idea that these problem could be alleviated by having everything put back into place and tightened up, but yay!!! Not only do I look better, but I feel better too. Win- win!!! I highly recommend Dr. Feagin and his staff. They are knowledgeable, caring, and do great work!

name: Mallorie Hinson
text: Dr. Owen was spectacular. He gave me exactly what I asked for. I am highly satisfied with the services he provided for me. The staff were very friendly and helpful! I would highly recommend them!!

name: Michael Young
text: Very highly recommend this place for any type of cosmetic procedures. My wife and I was very pleased with the results even though its been only two weeks,also the staff was very friendly and helpful.Thanks a lot Dr.Owens and Ms.Olivia for everything...

name: Vicki Morrison
text: After having a baby and losing almost 100 pounds, I needed some help with the excess skin on my tummy. Dr. Feagin more than helped me! I now have the flattest, hottest tummy there is!

name: Adele Pridgen
text: I couldn't get through the receptionist, Hillary, who was very rude and tried to tell me what my insurance would cover and what they wouldn't. Without a consultation, I'm not sure how a receptionist can tell me what is medically necessary and what isn't. I will NOT go to this surgeon because if thier receptionist is this rude I can't imagine what the rest of the staff is like. I'm very disappointed as I know Dr. Feagin has a wonderful reputation.

name: Summer Knight
text: Dr Fegan made my face and neck look so beautiful. I would come back to Dothan for my cosmetic procedures.

name: marqueta mitchell
text:
The best Dr... Alive he loves😍😍 and care about you
And his work is amazing!!! 2 year tummy tuck and fat transfer to my butt.... I'm loving it!!!! 👙👙👙

name: Dawn Bailey
text:
Dr Owen which I heard such raving reviews about disappointed me so much. He put deep grooves in my hips and called it my waist. My pants automatically roll down to this groove. I’m constantly having to pull my pants up. I asked him about it and he swore that was my waist. Lol, you can’t talk to him. He’s always right!! Also my upper muscles are separated again. My upper abdomen has protruded further than my lower ever since he performed my full tummy tuck. An improvement from
before but I still despise the way I look.
The women in the office are mean. He also treated my sister really mean. Dr Dinkle needs to stop harassing me on the phone.

name: Tasharah Cummings
text: Dr Owens and staff are spectacular!!! I had a wonderful experience and my results are perfect!!! I would highly recommend them!!!

name: Abbie Pierce
text: Botox buyers beware!!! I wanted Botox to help with my forehead wrinkles, and was fairly apprehensive since this would be my first time trying it. I was mostly concerned about getting too much injected so as to give me a "droopy" eye, and brought this specific concern up to Dr Feagin beforehand. He assured me that he knew how to administer the drug so that wouldn't happen, and I went forward with the procedure. I now have a droopy right eye. The skin under my brow is completely sagging over my eyelid and it is both uncomfortable and unsightly. I am waiting on a call back to see if there is anything he can do to fix it, but from what I've read, I just have to wait till it wears off.

name: Whitney Geohagan
text: Friendly staff and I am always satisfied with my results!

name: Tori Fleahman
text: I never had the chance to meet Dr Feagin and Owen, however I can say that their staff is appalling. I cancelled my consultation after speaking with Jennifer over the phone. Such a rude and hateful attitude, there is absolutely NO way I would be giving my money to a practice that cannot treat their future patients kindly.

name: Libba Hartzog
text: Very happy with face, neck, and brow work. Highly recommend their work!

name: Veronica Armstrong
text: I recently had a belt lipectomy (June2016) I did a lot of research on who I wanted to perform this life changing surgery over the past year prior. I chose Dr Owen from Feagin & Owen in Dothan AL. Almost every person I approached that wore scrubs from a hospital highly recommended Dr Owen is the person I wanted. I made the consult appt and found Dr Owen to be very professional. He always expressed any concerns or question about my surgery I could contact him any time. A little back ground on myself 10 yrs ago I had gastric bypass surgery after weighing in at 350 lb. I have thought about this surgery for the past 3 yrs. I lost a total of 150lb and slowly crept 35 lb thru the yrs. My idea weight I wanted to achieve is 200. I'm 5-11. After removing 16 lb hanging off my body I came out of surgery weighting 219. Today i'm 213 and going to reach my goal with my new found inspiration of this new body. I went from a Lane Bryant 20 to a 16. I'm amazed every time I actually look at myself now at the work Dr Owens has performed as it was a struggle removing 16lbs. I plan on doing a small revision after a year just to perfect the final touches. I would highly recommend Dr Owen if you are planing this body transforming surgery. He never made me feel embarrassed or ashamed when I had to reveal the part of myself I was most embarrassed by. He is truly a professional and only looked at my issue as the best way to achieve the best results for me. Thank you Dr. Owen for being on top of your game and truly want the best for your patients.

name: LaJuanna Walker
text: If you are black and overweight don't go see the bald guy. He has a God complex and he is very nasty towards you. Tries to belittle you and make you feel like your questions are not legitimate. He is very biased and he will not even touch you. I have been to him 2-3 times at the request of my doctors for a breast reduction. He told me I should just go chop them off. Who tells a woman that kind of thing when they come to you for help???? I implore all women of color to stay away from him because mentally he is jacked up.

name: Reagan Chaney
text: I got a breast reduction in December 2015 and I think Dr Owen did a wonderful job!

name: Anna C
text: Wonderful surgeons and wonderful staff! I wouldn't go any where else!

name: Sharon Laurent
text: Dr.  Feagin is very nice and easy to talk too. If I had any questions he didn't mind answering them I highly recommend this doctor.

name: Casey Humphrey
text: Results were EXACTLY what I asked for! Couldn't be more please! Thank you Dr. Owen and staff!!

name: Vanessa Ayala
text: A few years ago Dr Feagin he did my breast and I was not happy at all. One of my breast is bigger than the other one.  Not good.

name: Shaphan Fitts
text: My girlfriend also never met with the drs due to several very rude emails she received from what sounds like the same person.

name: Rachael
text: Love Dr Feagin!!!

name: judy bryte
text: Highly recommend...

name: Q Dee
text: Consultation went well

name: Virginia Swarttz
text: Was scheduled for a consultation that got canceled same day (three hours prior to my appointment). Rescheduled and that day ,after working all day since 6am, I had to wait for 3 hours for just the consultation. The consultation was for surgery on my face which is something I think most people would be very nervous about. The consultation seemed very rushed. Also, on the phone they told me I would have a simulation done of what the results would possibly look like but they did not do that either. Very disappointed. I ended up going to have a consultation with a surgeon in Birmingham and having it done with them. They got me straight in and out. The surgeon here was very knowledgeable and confident.

name: Shena Moran
text: I am about 5 weeks post-op after a breast reduction. Dr. Budny was my surgeon and I can’t say enough good things about him and his staff. From the consultation, to scheduling, the surgery and recovery it has been a seamless process. I am so happy that I made the decision to go ahead with the procedure. I highly recommend Dr. Budny!

name: Traci Davidson
text:
I had my Liposuction and a Tummy Tuck on Dec. 7, 2020. It was a great experience. I was so nervous when I went for my consultation. Because I had been watching YouTube and seen all the pain and misery people were going through. And how they were having bad experiences with the company they choose.
But I did not have that experience, the entire staff was very nice, from the front receptionist to the nurses. My doctor was Dr. Budny, he was welcoming, funny, attentive, honest and listened to my desires. And he did an awesome job with my procedures. Even on the week he was off from the facility he said if I had any concerns or problems to call the office and he would come in to assist me.
This is a great place to have your procedure done.

name: Kaye Kelley
text: About late 1997 or early 2000 I went in to Dr Budny  as I was coming out of my anesthesia,  I heard him say I was the first one he had to ever done lipo on legs.   Since then I still can’t wear a bathing suit.   He did an incision on the inside of both legs.  I should have gone back to him I couldn’t because being cut was the most painful thing I had ever been through.  Always wanted to feel comfortable about wearing a bathing suit but still to this day I can’t.   What should I do.     Kaye Kelley

name: Lakeshia Peake
text: Very nice staff. Dr Bentley is very good at what he does. The only thing I hate is that I waited for about 3hrs at my post op visit.

name: Karen Blackmon Caldwell Somerset
text:
They say that those fat cells will never reappear...
What they don’t say is there is plenty of fat cells to take there place.

They should tell you that the large amount of money you are spending... is for not!!!

name: Barbara Ann Ewer
text: Dr. Bentley is amazingly talented and skilled at what he does. He cares for his patients and their welfare. Everything you could ask for in a Plastic surgeon! The staff is amazingly supportive and so helpful walking you through any process. So grateful for all of them!

name: Jessica Matthews
text: Dr. Clark did an amazing job, I am beyond happy and feel like my augmentation looks completely natural. He has a talent! The staff is helpful and kind. Even after surgery the care has continued. I would highly recommend Dr Clark!!

name: Vicki Smith
text: I love Dr. Robertson.  He has removed several skin cancers and has done a great job.  He also has a great bedside manner.

name: Alexus Clayton
text: Dr.Bentley is great. Everyone in the office is amazing.

name: Wallene Prudames
text: Love the caring and service that accompanies our visit here!  Incredible work by knowing professionals.  Five stars all the way!

name: Naomi Powell
text: So far my experience with Plastic Surgery Associates is AMAZING. The staff is so helpful and kind Dr. Clark put me at ease about my surgery he was very professional.

name: Derek Olson
text: Dr. Robertson is fantastic! My wife got bit by a jack russell terrier on the lip and he was the plastic surgeon working at the ER that night. The ER doctor recommended plastic surgery (as opposed to regular stitches) and we took her advice and are so glad we got Dr. Robertson. The dog bite was a really traumatic experience but Dr. Robertson was so calm and collected from start to finish. He was constantly explaining the procedure and what he was about to do, which my wife said was comforting and reassuring. He is professional and has a very confident demeanor. I highly recommend him.

name: Jacqueline Reems
text:
My experience with Plastic Surgery Associates has been absolutely horrible.  I had a rhinoplasty done over 6 months ago.

And I am learning that I  done an injustice.  My nose after surgery looked like it had been butchered inside and outside.

From other patients who have had surgery of this nature, I have learned that their physician's office staff took time to clean their nose and rid the nose of the dried blood because of the sensitivity and nature.  This was not done for me.

My cuts were not in line.  I was cut on skin instead of along the clean lines of the nostril.  My nose inside looks like he was drunk when he did my surgery.

The outcome was not what I expected at all.  He did not make my nose look natural at all.  I am actually wondering what was Dr. Bentley thinking when he was doing the work.  My finished product looked nothing like the image that l was given.

The lady Kristin who answers the phone can be very rude and abrasive.

I came to appointments and had to wait excessively.  I am so upset and hurt.  And the problem is that it cannot be undone.

name: Nicole Hicks
text: Did a great job on my daughter and I.

name: Debbie McKinnon
text: I scheduled an appointment days in advance ask for the price of my chemical peel. I was given a Hydra Facial instead.  When I checked out my bill was more than what she originally quoted me over the phone. When the lady finished my facial she didn’t even turn the light back on and she left the blue hair net on my head. I gave them two stars because they were there on time and they were friendly but they were clueless and lost on the business side of things. ( I am still wondering why she didn’t turn the light on and left the blue hair net on my head)  I will not be going back. This was my first facial. I hate I was quoted one price but charged more at check out.

name: Terri Adams
text: Takes forever for someone to call you back to schedule an appointment.

name: Julianna Cannon
text: Do not recommend.

name: Lance Siler
text: I am coming to see hem this Monday .need to get in asap

name: Lindsay Bailey
text: Wonderful experience

name: CURRIE STONE
text: Dr. Wilson has completely changed my life & I’m so blessed to have found him! I spent months thoroughly researching every board-certified plastic surgeon in Alabama & his work just speaks for itself. I live 2 hours away, but having a procedure such as mine is really a once-in-a-lifetime deal so it was extremely important to have the best experience possible. His staff are just the absolute greatest & always make me feel welcome. I highly recommend Wilson Plastic Surgery, especially to those who are seeking to transform their lives after weight loss!

name: Elisabeth Atkinson
text: Compassionate, caring, extremely knowledgeable! Dr. Wilson and his staff go above and beyond when it comes to their patients. I had a pretty extensive surgery which involved removal of loose skin from weight loss surgery, a tummy tuck and a lower body lift. Upon my initial consultation I was very impressed how Dr. Wilson listened to me and then explained what surgery he felt would benefit me the most after looking at the areas I was having issues with. Before seeing Dr. Wilson I was very self conscious about everything, but from my first phone call to his office, through my entire procedure and healing they have made me feel comfortable and have been there every step of the way. I cannot say enough positive things about Dr. Wilson and his staff!

name: Georgia Hernandez
text: Dr. Wilson is amazing. I’ve had a great experience with him for my breast augmentation. He’s honest and tells you exactly what your options are. He assured my husband in the hospital he would take great care of me and he has every step of the way. I trust him and can’t wait to have another procedure with him.

name: Bennett Bembry
text: My husband and I love Dr. Wilson and his staff. Dr. Wilson always listens to my concerns about my problem areas. I never feel rushed during my consultations or my procedures. His office staff are always so kind and work diligently to work us into Dr. Wilson’s schedule. I would recommend anyone to this fabulous team.

name: Stacy Johnson
text: I am so pleased with the work I had done. Dr.Wilson did botox and I got lip injections. I will be going back for touch ups when needed and I would recommend him and his amazing staff to anyone

name: Emily Hill
text: I am very happy with my surgery! I got lipo on my chin and it turned out better than I could have expected. Dr. Wilson and his staff are super kind and I couldn’t recommend them enough!!

name: Marie Bronte
text: I love Dr.Wilson and his staff! He really takes the time to make sure you are comfortable and has great bedside manner.

name: Taylor Davison
text:
I hardly give out reviews . However, Dr Wilson and his entire staff have impressed me so much I have to brag on them. I've never been more comfortable start to finish even the nurses at Huntsville hospital were spectacular. I had a breast augmentation done yesterday and my results are exactly how I wanted. He is such a fantastic surgeon and kind doctor. Ladies up front are amazing! If you need any kind of plastic surgery
go to Wilson Plastic Surgery! You'll be just as impressed as I am!! Thank you all so so much!

Taylor Jensen

name: Christie Chandler
text: I’ve always had a low self esteem so this has totally changed my life. He did it to perfection. Very proud of my results and how they turned out.

name: Monica Cottingham
text: Dr Wilson and his staff are all top notch. I’ve really pleased with my surgery and the care I received.

name: Caroline Schreeder
text: Tammy is the absolute best aesthetician!! She’s extremely good at evaluating your skin and knowing exactly what you need! I have been going to her for over 5 years and have never been disappointed!! She’s wonderful!

name: Tammy Linn
text: Could not be happier with the results of my procedure.  Dr. Wilson listened to my goals and proceeded to achieve them in the kindest most pain free way possible.  I am going to be approaching my upcoming wedding with alot more confidence and looking like the best version of me possible.

name: Lauren Lane
text: After researching Plastic Surgeons, I decided to give Wilson a go. I requested an appointment on their website. After a while, I received an email to call their office. Not sure why they have that feature if you just have to call but I complied and called. I scheduled an appointment for 2 months out because the Dr. Wilson had been on vacation and was backed up. On the Friday before my appointment that next week, his office called me and said something came up with his schedule and they had to reschedule my appointment for another 2 months out! So today, they call me, 2 weeks before my consultation, and tell me that they can’t see me until I’m tobacco free for 6 weeks. Ok, I understand there can be complications and I would have gladly stopped my nasty weekend habit but why wait until 2 weeks before?! Why not tell me that from the start of this 4 month process?! Would not recommend going down the rabbit hole of this process!!

name: Shannon Minor
text: I have had several facial treatments with esthetician Tammy Stedham and my experience was absolutely amazing!! She worked wonders on my skin in a very short time. She is professional, knowledgeable and friendly. I have more confidence now and that is priceless! I would highly recommend Tammy to anyone!! The entire staff at Wilson Plastic Surgery are awesome!

name: Jasmine Jones
text:
Dr. Wilson & his staff are nothing short of amazing! I had a tummy tuck w/ lipo of the flanks & abdomen. Although I am fresh out of surgery, I have seen the results & was bought to tears! He has truly changed my life for the better! I LOVE his passion for his job & his staff are the sweetest people EVER. I would recommend him a thousand times over! Thank you Dr. Wilson & thank you to his staff for being so attentive & patient w/ me. 10/10 🌟

UPDATE: I am currently 1month out & let me tell you.... This man did NOT disappoint! Everyone I know thinks I had a bbl when I did NOT & my scar is darn near non existent ( & that’s speaking as an African American, we tend to scar darker ). I’m thrilled with my results!

name: Samantha Jo
text: I am nearly 2 weeks out from my mommy makeover. I am in awe of my new body; Dr. Wilson’s tummy tucks are absolutely beautiful. I am still recovering, but already, my results have far exceeded my expectations.  This surgery is truly life changing. I had recently gained weight after being so discouraged with how my hard work in the gym (and in the kitchen!) just wasn’t paying off.  This surgery gave me what I needed to get back to my healthy lifestyle. Best money I ever spent! Dr. Wilson is super professional and has amazing skill. The ladies at the office are just so awesome and fun to top it off. I highly recommend this practice and will definitely return if I need any more beauty enhancing procedures in the future!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! They made our day!

name: Lauren Santoro
text: If there were 10 stars, I would have chosen 10! I am so happy with my results and highly recommend Dr. Wilson and his staff. I had a breast reduction and tummy tuck 6 weeks ago. Any question I had, they answered in a very timely manner. Dr. Wilson is professional and has a great bedside manner to him. His staff is great and I truly enjoy going there for my post-op appointments. I can't recommend this office enough. Thank you guys for making me feel like myself again.

name: Lucia Rowe
text: I’m  happy that I chose Dr Wilson to do my mommy makeover . I am 1 week post op and I am thrilled my results and the care that I have received . He is not cheap but worth every dime !!! I went from a belly with lose skin that I had to work hard to hide to a gorgeous hourglass figure . He did everything I asked and more! Also cannot forget his staff . They have been amazing !! Barb is the sweetest lady and works hard to help anyway she can .

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!

name: Maryann Sparks
text: Dr. Wilson did my mommy tuck 5yrs ago, he answered all of my worries, and staff members were very professional.   I was happy then and still happy till today.  I highly recommend his practice to everyone.   Thank you  so much.

name: mary beth ledford
text: Dr. Wilson is an artist! I'm on week 5 of recovery from a reduction surgery and still amazed at the results. Each person on his staff is incredibly kind and understanding. I never felt uncomfortable or uneasy. Realistic expectations were set and even exceeded. 10/10 recommend.

name: Sarah Hendershot
text: Dr. Wilson and his staff (Hey Becky!) are so awesome. I'm extremely pleased with my results. My healing has been wonderful  and my scarring minimal.

name: Jaleesa
text: Just had my 6 month post-op appointment today after having a breast reduction in Jan 2020. I went from a 38DDD to a 38C with very minimal scaring. From my consultation visit to now, my entire experience was awesome! Friendly staff with huge smiles (even underneath the masks...thanks to COVID-19); they always made me feel welcome. I highly recommend Dr. Wilson. Super knowledgeable and professional!

name: S B
text: I did the mommy makeover, and I am happy with it! It’s been just over six weeks and I still have some swelling, but I can see the difference. Dr. Wilson was and is very informative with any questions that I have. The surgery experience was good as well. Meaning I was taken care of before and after the surgery. The office staff are great and help with any questions or issues I may have.

name: Ariel Bell
text: Dr. Wilson and his team were wonderful to work with and I am extremely happy with the  results from my reduction surgery! They were very professional and attentive when it came to addressing any questions or concerns I had. I can finally move freely and without pain. I highly recommend Dr. Wilson for anyone looking for a top notch plastic surgeon.

name: Beth Cole
text: After searching for months for a surgeon and doing research on all of them within a 600 mile radius I found Dr. Wilson. I did my homework on him and found to be he was the greatest doctor around around. I had a tummy tuck.lipo.breast lift and implants. I have not had any pain since I left the hospital and the recovery has been great. Dr.Wilson and his staff are amazing. I recommend them to everyone.

name: Julie Savage
text: The whole team takes care of you here and Dr. Wilson is a superstar at his craft. I am almost 3 weeks post-op from a high definition tummy tuck and am already very excited about my results. He's very easy to talk to and ask questions and I've felt comfortable with him as a human and a doctor the whole way through.  Check out his instagram site to see his work - it's fascinating to see the different cases and results and he shares a lot about his processes too.

name: Deanna White
text: Extremely happy with my results! Dr.Wilson and his staff  were a pleasure.  Dr.Wilson was always ready to answer any of my questions.  I would recommend him to anyone seeking cosmetic treatment.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!!!

name: Brandi Travis
text: Dr. Wilson and his staff are very personable and professional. Everyone gets greeted at the door setting the tone for a most pleasant visit.  Dr. Wilson takes his time with his patients and goes the extra mile. I had a wonderful experience with Dr. Wilson.

resp.text: Reviews like this make our day!

name: Angela Gibson
text: Let me start by saying, I’m a nurse, so we tend to be challenging patients by default. I have worked with and have been a patient of many different types of surgeons and I can honestly say Dr. Wilson and his staff are among the most elite. The office as a whole are like family and treat their patients the same. I have never felt more comfortable in such a vulnerable state. As far as my personal experience, I had an abdominoplasty done several yrs ago from a previous surgeon, where I was told my outcome would be one thing, but my results were anything but and no explanation was ever given. This left me more self conscious than I had ever felt before. I came to Dr. Wilson in hopes that he could restore the self esteem I felt I’d lost. He was very up front and honest with what he felt he could accomplish, which I greatly appreciated. The results exceeded my expectations and I couldn’t be happier. Dr. Wilson is very much a Type 1 perfectionist, which is exactly who you want performing any type of procedure! He is meticulous from the first cut to the last stitch and every detail in between and after. He is truly anointed in his work! I just can’t say enough good things about this office.

name: Susan Redwine
text:
I went to Dr. Wilson “to see about” getting Botox between my eyebrows. Dr. Wilson spent exactly five minutes with me only to tell me it would be $300. I thought that it was completely overpriced and decided not to do it. Upon leaving they charged me $50 for a consultation. They NEVER ONCE told me there was a consultation fee. Apparently they only charge you if you don’t get their service???
Actually that would be great information going in not coming out!!!
That is absurd and completely ridiculous!!! 😡

resp.text: Dr. Wilson’s injectable prices are consistent with Board Certified Plastic Surgeons.  All our new patients are told upon booking an injectable consult that they will be charged $50 for the consult if they do not get a treatment that same day. This fee covers the staff’s time and Dr. Wilson’s time.

name: Tina Rainwater
text: My experience working with Dr. Wilson and his staff has been excellent. From the initial consultation to the post op appointments, Dr. Wilson has been nothing but an absolute professional. He made me feel comfortable throughout the entire process and his work is amazing. Thanks to Dr. Wilson I am now much more confident in my skin and feel so much better overall. 10/10

name: Tammie Bacon
text: Dr. Wilson and his staff deliver a welcoming and professional environment. His professionalism is exemplary. He provides detailed, thorough, and knowledgeable explanations of services and implements procedures that leave his clients beautifully rejuvenated!

name: Emily Morgan
text:
I am a patient of Dr. Wilson's and he performed my mommy makeover. I had diastasis recti from my pregnancies and breast tissue loss from breastfeeding.
I have wanted to have this done for 6 years and finally had the courage to go see Dr. Wilson. He was very informative and answered all of my questions in great detail. I knew exactly what I was in for when I made my decision.  He is very professional and has wonderful bedside manner. His office staff made me feel important as well as comfortable and they do every time I go back!
I am three weeks post op and I still have some healing to do, but I am already fascinated by my results. They're more than I could have ever imagined. I have all the confidence now, and I'm so grateful to him for it. This is one of the best decisions I ever made! I Highly recommend, the 5 stars don't even cut it!

name: Jennifer Williams
text: I am 3 days post breast reduction surgery, and i am already back to work! I couldn’t be more happy with my results, I am in love with my much smaller and perkier breast! Dr. Wilson and the Women and Children staff was phenomenal, 10/10.

resp.text: We are so happy that you love your results!

name: Μ. Palma
text: Dr. Wilson and his team are amazing. They took great care of me and gave me my confidence back after years of physical pain and mental insecurities.

name: Olivia & Chantel
text:
Patrick Wilson is the best in Huntsville!

I have used Dr Wilson for two separate surgeries, two separate locations over the years

. He’s AMAZING.

Literally the best plastic sugeron for transforming your body into a masterpiece.

I am not afflicted with the company, him or anything. This is just my honest to God experience and knowledge. I love him and prefer him over other surgeons I have seen in the past!

name: Angie Boyette
text: August 2019 will be 2 years since my breast augmentation.  Dr Wilson and his staff are AMAZING! Surgery went well and i am VERY happy with my results! Another place I called was booked and was 3 months before I could even get a consultation. A friend recomended, I called a few minutes later,and they got me in 2 days later! 2 weeks after that,  surgery was done and went great! I highly recommend this group! Thanks Dr Wilson and staff!!!! ❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤

name: blue berry
text:
Dr. Wilson is by FAR the BEST plastic surgeon in the area!!

He did such beautiful work on my breasts!  I had a breast lift with 400 cc silicone implants.. The shape is perfect, I cannot express how happy I am with my results:)
Dr. Wilson has also transformed my tummy.. I had a tummy tuck done last year and now I have a perfectly flat tummy and a cute little belly button! Dr. Wilson is an artist, I would never consider going anywhere else!

name: Pamela Cooper
text: I can honestly tell you that Dr. Patrick Wilson is THE BEST plastic surgeon in this area.  Please do not take heed to those one star ratings because they obviously mistakenly left ratings for the wrong doctor. My story:  I was diagnosed with breast cancer and had a bilateral mastectomy with immediate breast reconstruction. Not knowing to research plastic surgeons I was "assigned" a surgeon with the large PS firm in town.  This large firm was very busy and doctor and staff mechanical and cold.  I felt like just another number to them. This reconstruction was totally botched and I ended up with tissue necrosis with large gaping holes in my new breasts and severe infections. I was mortified and heartbroken. I decided to try another doctor and went to a prominent PS in Birmingham. He fixed the tissue necrosis crisis and then performed another reconstruction. Botched Again.  I had survived breast cancer but was now depressed from the constant pain and from the results of these reconstructions.  I was about to give up when I found Dr. Wilson's website and decided to give it one last shot. From the moment I met him I knew I was finally in the right place.   He is extremely kind and compassionate and a truly gifted surgeon. He is a perfectionist which I absolutely mean  in the best way as a compliment. My results are PERFECT and I couldn't be happier.  Nurse Barbara is also very kind, helpful and easy to talk to as is Ashley. The entire office gets a high five from me.  I love that this is a small office and Dr. Wilson took as much time as needed to really listen and communicate on a one on one basis. I got the very best care and the best possible results. I very highly recommend Dr. Patrick Wilson.  He was heaven sent and I am forever grateful to him.

name: Stacey Brim
text: Dr. Wilson is articulate.  That along with his bedside manner and candor are hard to find when it comes to patient care.  His staff answered my questions and are very supportive.  I am 3 days post op.  I had my old implants replaced along with a lift.  I am very pleased.   I would highly recommend him !!

name: Tina Finch
text: Felt very comfortable with Dr. Wilson and his staff from the minute I walked in.  Their professionalism and the way they care about their patients is outstanding! I can't say enough good things about all of them.  The results from my procedures surpassed anything I could of ever imagined.

name: Gennie McCaig
text: I am extremely happy with my results. I have have had larger breasts since age 14. I am absolutely amazed at the immediate relief of back pain since my surgery. No more pinching in my shoulder blades, no more neck pain, and I haven't taken ibuprofen in... wow, I can't even remember the last time. Dr. Wilson's staff are ALWAYS professional, and they return your calls and answer all questions in a timely manner. His nurse Barbara is one of a kind, very attentive to your needs. I highly recommend this surgeon and I wouldn't change a thing about my surgery. I can now wear regular sized shirts without popping buttons! Thank you Dr. Wilson!  Call his office and stop wasting time... every day you suffer is a day you could have been happier post surgery. Good luck!

name: April Barnes
text: Dr. Wilson is the best plastic surgeon I ever met. He is very professional and easy to talk too. He explains your procedure in depth. He makes you feel comfortable about your procedure. Also his office staff are wonderful. Ms. Barbara and Ms Ashlee are twp amazing woman who will make you smile and feel great about your procedure before and after. I would recommend everyone to go visit Dr Patrick Wilson's Plastic Surgery Office. You can not and will not get good quality service from anyone else. I was blessed to have an opportunity to meet them. Please go visit Dr Wilson's office and experience what I have experience.

name: Dianna Tucker
text: Caring, professional office staff. Wonderfully talented doctor. I would recommend Dr Wilson.

name: Courtney Humbaugh
text: I had a breast lift and implant by Dr. Patrick Wilson. From the beginning consult to the recovery period, Dr. Wilson and his staff provided the most professional environment. The things that makes Dr. Wilson stand out is that he is caring, compassionate and extremely knowledgeable about his field. As a mother, I was concerned about the recovery period and what to expect. Dr. Wilson was extremely informative and always there when I had a question. His staff is respectful, attentive and caring as well. I highly recommend Wilson Plastic Surgery. You will be highly impressed.

name: Laivior Harris
text: I had an awesome experience with Dr. Wilson.. His office staff is wonderful.. I was nervous about my procedure in the beginning.. He answered all my questions.. My follow up visits went well.. I was so pleased.. I look better than I could even imagine. .!!

name: Natalie Terrell
text: A very meticulous and detail oriented plastic surgeon who is very professional and humble. With Dr.Wilson the health and well being of the patient is the most important thing. Highly recommended.

name: Rene' Holt
text: I went to Dr. Wilson for a breast reduction and I couldn't be more thrilled with the results. Barb and Dr. Wilson made me feel very welcome and not like I was just another number. They always explained in detail any answers to questions or concerns I had. I couldn't have asked for a better experience and they went above and beyond to help me get it covered by insurance when another docltd in town just said no. I recommend Dr. Wilson and his staff to everyone who needs any cosmetic surgery or reconstruction surgery. They are wonderful and I am still happy with my results almost two years later!

name: Lexie Robinson Austin
text: WONDERFUL!  Dr. Wilson and his staff are the epitome of professionalism.  From the time I (nervously!) first entered their office, they were incredibly welcoming and made me feel very comfortable.  I think most of us have a certain negative perception of plastic surgeons from TV shows and movies, but their office is nothing like that.  The staff, Ashlee and Barb are SO friendly and they really make an effort to get to know you as a person.  Dr. Wilson was wonderful to work with and truly is an artist. I love the results of my surgery!  I'm also a little bit of a hypochondriac and Dr. Wilson was very patient with me when I called him post surgery on weekends or off times with concerns. Overall, it was a wonderful experience and I have already recommended Dr. Wilson to friends!

name: Joanna Pullen
text: Dr Wilson is absolutely fabulous and then some. He is such a perfectionist and his work shows. I have had a mini tummy tuck and several injections in my face. All of my procedures have exceeded my expectations. His office staff is beyond superior. I am not sure where the negative comments came from because they are absolutely false. I would highly recommend Dr Wilson to anyone seeking plastic surgery services. I have sent several of my friends to him for breast augmentations and they are 100 percent satisfied!!!!!!! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE Dr Wilson

name: Tiffany Becker
text: Dr. Wilson and his staff were amazing!  The office was nice and cozy and the staff always professional.  I felt very comfortable asking Dr. Wilson all of my questions.  My initial consultation was a little lengthy with all of our questions but we never felt rushed.  I am very happy with the results and would highly recommend Dr. Wilson!

name: Brittany Kirkwood
text: I highly recommend Dr. Wilson. I spent almost a year researching Drs & looking at before & after pictures before I scheduled my consultation with Dr. Wilson. Walking into my consult I thought to myself “oh lord, I’m about to hear everything that’s wrong with my body”. IT WAS THE EXACT opposite! Dr. Wilson allows you to tell him what bothers you about your body & what you’d like to change. Then he goes into extreme detail with you on how each procedure is done. He makes sure that you understand what can & can’t be done to insure that you don’t come home disappointed with your results. I had a breast lift & tummy tuck with lipo & muscle repair. The results are more than I could have EVER imagined they would be! My husband was not on board with this surgery until he saw the results. Hubby’s exact words were “I had no idea that it would make this much of a difference”. Dr. Wilson is very particular about his work & is the only plastic surgeon that I researched that can make a cute belly button! He also makes sure that your incision is as low as possible to be concealed in a swim suit. While recovering I have had several questions & never had an issue reaching someone at the office. One time I emailed Dr. Wilson after hours & received a reply within minutes. From my experience if you want a Dr. that gives you a quote that involves no other out of pocket costs, that is realistic about the outcome of your procedure, cares about his patients, & insures your comfort at all times then Dr. Wilson is the Dr. for you.

name: Rita Woods
text: Dr Wilson and his staff are wonderful.  I had breast reduction and it has been the best thing I could have done.  My neck feels wonderful.  I could tell the very first day there was such an improvement.  I recommend Dr Patrick Wilson.  I will use him again should I need more plastic surgery.

name: Alex Herring
text: Dr. Wilson is one of the best doctors I have ever been to! He is a very upfront and honest doctor and if he doesn't feel as though he can give you what you're looking for he does not want to waste your time and money! He has an incredible beside manner and produces great results. My personal experience was very very good and I would definitely recommend him to anyone.

name: Katie Foster
text: Our daughter had "lop ear" when she was born. She saw Dr. Wilson when she was just 4 days old. We went every week after for a month. As first time parents, we were nervous about the whole thing.  They were all very nice and accommodating. He was also very gentle and understanding with our band new baby. I would highly recommend him.

name: Rhae Holtkamp
text: Dr. Wilson and his entire staff are wonderful! Dr. Wilson has always exceeded my expectations. He is very friendly, professional and a perfectionist. I highly recommend Wilson Plastic Surgery and wouldn’t go anywhere else!

name: Marie Schneider
text: Dr. Wilson provided reconstruction to a dear family friend after she was diagnosed with breast cancer and opted to have a double mastectomy. This friend interviewed another larger plastic surgery group in town and Dr. Wilson stood out as the most caring, compassionate, and informative between them. He answered all of her questions and addressed all of her concerns professionally and in a caring manner, making her feel truly comfortable to have this procedure done. When she had a question, HE was the one who called back and HE was the one available to help. Double breast reconstruction is a lengthy process, and Dr. Wilson was attentive and caring through each step of the process. She looks wonderful, feels like a new woman again having beat this cancer and maintaining her confidence and femininity. Thank you Dr. Wilson!!

name: Elizabeth March
text: I can honestly tell you that Dr. Patrick Wilson is The Best plastic surgeon in the area. After mastectomy I had the misfortune to have been a patient of the large PS firm in town for breast reconstruction which was a total nightmare. After that one was botched I went to another prominent PS in Birmingham. Botched Again.  I was about to give up when I found Dr. Wilson's website. From the moment I met him I knew I was finally in the right place.  My results are PERFECT and I couldn't be happier.  He is extremely kind and compassionate and a truly gifted surgeon.  Nurse Barbara is also very kind, helpful and easy to talk to.  I very highly recommend Dr. Patrick Wilson.  He was heaven sent and I am forever grateful to him.

text: Full disclosure I am currently filing a complaint with the medical board against this practice. First the day of my appointment I was asked to move my appointment to earlier which I agreed to but wasn’t seen till after the original appointment time. During the consultation for breast reduction I was uncomfortable with both un professional comments and the way he handled my breast. I thought maybe I was overly sensitive but wanted to be comfortable with the surgeon I choose. I ended up getting a second opinion and was very comfortable with the professionalism at the second doctor. Also they told me the info I had been given at Dr Wilson’s was inaccurate. I called Dr Wilson’s to tell them NOT to move ahead with the precertification request. I was told it was already submitted. This was in February. I figured I would let my insurance process it and then see if they would switch doctors on it. I just talked to my insurance company today 4/9/19. It wasn’t even submitted till March 26th so I totally could have let the second surgeon submit it.

resp.text: Nothing in this review is accurate.  As our previous reviews reflect over the last 8 years, we do everything possible to meet the expectations of our patients with the utmost respect and professionalism.

name: Chelsea Jordan
text: We took our son to Wilson Plastic Surgery for EarWells due to prominent ears. After many hours of traveling and the expenses involved we were very disappointed when the EarWells did not work what so ever. Our son’s ears looked better for about a week then went back to how they were prior to getting the EarWells. I called and told the doctor my sons ears had gone back to how they were prior to the EarWells and they asked me to email pictures. I sent the pictures and never heard back from the office. In the end all we ended up with was a bad haircut for our son.

resp.text:
I’m sorry that you did not get the results from the EarWell nonsurgical treatment that you were expecting.  Unfortunately, ear molding does not work 100% of the time, but we have had excellent results in the past.  We asked you to email us pictures out of respect for your travel time.  My office manager said that she left you a voicemail to call the office as our last form of communication.  Please call the office and ask to speak directly with me.
Sincerely,
Dr. Wilson
