name: Camila Jersonsky
text:
DON'T GO HERE. Where to begin? I got my ear pierced at the end of 2015, which caused bumps to grow by the piercings that keep growing and growing. They are called keloid scars, and they are the reason I went to see Dr Wilson.

​From the first day I didn't like him. He seemed arrogant and didn't really give me any options as far as treatment. He said that they were too small to remove surgically but that we could inject them with Kenalog to soften them and possibly shrink them but that they would not go away. I asked what else we could do if the Kenalog didn't work and he said nothing because they were too small and removing them would definitely cause them to grow back.

I decided to stick to him given that I had already paid for the doctor's visit and that I was consulting with another plastic surgeon (a friend's mom, in another country) on the phone and she agreed on the Kenalog shots as the first step of the treatment. The fact that I didn't like him didn't necessarily mean that he'd be a bad doctor, right?

We did the injections and a month later when I went back for the second round he said that the first round didn't do anything and that there was nothing else to do. No plan B, no nothing. That consultation lasted no more than 10 minutes and I was sent a bill for $65 for it. The first consultation was about $70 and the one round of injections was around $60. The whole thing was about $200. Not too bad but given the amount of time he spent with me that was steep.

6 months passed and the bumps had grown dramatically, so I decided to see the doctor again. I called and I was asked for a picture. I sent it via email but didn't hear back. I called back a week later they said that they had issues with their internet so asked me to send the picture again The doctor said that he would remove them surgically for $1500 if done privately. I asked about filing this with my health insurance and his office said that they would have to get it pre-approved, which takes 4-6 weeks. I asked for the CPT codes to talk to my health insurance myself (to see if they would cover the procedure without having to wait the 6 weeks) and they said they would get them to me once they talked to the doctor. I waited for a week and called back to ask for the codes but they said that they had been busy and hadn't had time to get them. It has been months. They never called me back.
​
​I decided to go to another doctor because I didn't like Dr Wilson in the first place and because his office was wasting my time (which meant that my keloids kept getting bigger). I went to my consultation and the new doctor told me that one round of injections alone wouldn't have helped, but that I should have had multiple rounds of injections instead. He also said that I should have gotten them removed when they were smaller because the chances of them coming back are way lower when not so much tissue is removed. He recommended that we did rounds of injections and then surgery, and provided other things to try if plan A wasn't successful.

In other words, Dr Wilson wasted my time (and money), stopped treatment too early, and gave me bad advice. He sent me home and discouraged me from treating the keloid scars for months. The bumps got way bigger (about 5 times the size) and when I got them removed I had much greater chances of them coming back. Not to mention that when they were smaller they didn't hurt but when they got bigger they hurt to sleep on and the injections were much more painful. I lived with these huge itchy painful bumps for about a year thanks to him, plus his office didn't even have the courtesy to call me back with stupid CPT codes to see if my insurance would cover any of it. I was (and still am) SO ANGRY I looked into suing for negligence, but apparently no death = no case. Now I just want to warn people so they don't go through the same. He might be good at other cosmetic procedures, but SCAR TREATMENT IS NOT ONE OF THEM. I wish he would have told me that this wasn't his specialty and recommended another doctor, instead of experimenting on me.

name: annette bramblett
text: I am so grateful to Dr Wilson . He and his staff are the best. I've always been afraid to smile in pictures because my eyes would look closed. My eyelift has changed my world... Literally and physically. Couldn't be happier.

Stay far far away from this place.

name: Hugh Praytor
text: Dr. K. Jackson and his staff at Alabama Surgical Arts were very knowledgeable, friendly, and helpful all the way from the consultation to after the surgery. I had 3 wisdom teeth removed. The surgery was successful. My pain level was manageable to minimal in the days following the surgery. I'd say my recovery was remarkable quick and Alabama Surgical Arts exceeded my expectations. The assisted my recovery in providing a list of medications and an antibiotic. They also gave me a form to take home to guide me to the quickest road to recovery. I may have "babied" my mouth  too much after surgery, but I was back to eat whatever I wanted in 9-10 days. I would highly recommend Dr. K. Jackson and his associates at Alabama Surgical Arts to anyone considering getting their wisdom teeth removed in the River Region! Thank you, Alabama Surgical Arts!

resp.text: Thank you for you kind words.

name: Ingrid Muniz
text: The Med Spa has been such a great place to take care of my skincare needs. Over the last few months I have noticed a drastic improvement in my skin and skin tone. They helped with clearing melasma I had around my cheeks allowing my skin to look much more youthful. High recommend their services for skin care needs!

resp.text: Thank you Kelsey does an amazing job with skincare and one of the most integral parts of our team. Happy you had great results!

name: Wanda Williams
text: I stay in Selma and was referred to an oral surgeon and his earliest appointment was two months away. I was in pain and couldn't wait two months. They got me in really quick. On the day of my procedure I had to be sedated. I was in and out of the office in less than an hour. They have friendly, professional staff and a excellent doctor. If you have to go somewhere for an oral surgical procedure, this is the place to go, Thank you all for the excellent experience. I would recommend to anyone but what really impressed me is their diligence in following up. Dr. Jackson called to check and see how was doing later on that night.

resp.text: Thank you Wanda we pride ourselves on being available especially in situations when time is of the essence.

name: Mr and Mrs Loller
text: Intake, handling, and discharge were all fine. Staff shows tremendous interest and care in their patients.  HOWEVER, I told them three times I was allergic to penicillin, yet was prescribed a penicillin antibiotic. Luckily, the staff at Walgreens caught the error and contacted them for a alternate antibiotic script.  Dr Nizam did call that evening to check on me, but I missed the call.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about your inconvenience. Happy we got it handled for you!

name: Ali Meghani
text: I had a very good consultation with Dr Nizam, he explained everything to me in a very detailed fashion and was very honest and helpful with my options

resp.text: Thank you. It was a pleasure getting to meet you!

name: Richard Sky
text: Very nice facility.  Staff both professional and friendly.  Appreciated the focused yet empathetic approach to my problem.  Very impressed with Dr Nizam and his OR nurses.  As a word- and language-freak, I particularly compliment the post-operation written instructions.  And as a retired military, I search for and notice character and work ethic, as well as desired results, and they are all here at Alabama Surgical Arts.

resp.text: Thank you for the impressively written review. All things we strive for!

name: LaBella Renee
text: I should have written this a long time ago. However, I plan on calling in today to schedule an extraction. So, it made me think about the AMAZING service I received with my 1st one. Dr. Nazim is AMAZING.  The front desk, back office staff and everyone there was so inviting. I've ALWAYS had bad experiences getting anything done to my teeth. Which I did explain to them and I was nothing more than pleased. I didn't even swell. I ALWAYS swell. But he did immaculate work.

resp.text: Thank you so much. We look forward to seeing you!

name: Bernard Lowe jr
text:
I can't say enough good things about my experiences with Alabama surgical arts, Dr. Nizam, and all the staff.  I am a veteran and it has been a difficult process getting my procedures approved, but the staff helped walk me through the steps and eventually got my procedures approved.  Dr. Nizam was awesome in discussing my upcoming surgeries and making sure I was comfortable.  Unfortunately, I developed a clot on the site of my surgery on a Friday, AFTER HOURS!  Dr. Nizam and his wife personally treated me, and were extremely pleasant and comforting.

I don't get dental surgery often, but when I do I only want to use Alabama surgical arts and Dr. Nizam!  😁

name: Tracey Canada
text: Alabama Surgical Arts provides a warm and inviting atmosphere. The facility is beautiful, clean, and very spacious. Each staff member I encountered was equally warm, friendly and engaging. A very professional team. Their customer services is top notch! They provide detailed instructions each and every step of the way. Every question I had was answered with a smile, even behind the masks. 😀. Dr. Sami Nazam, II was a joy to have a Doctor. I was extremely nervous, not knowing who I would be seeing on my first visit, but his aura was kind, caring and confident. Upon reviewing my x-rays he quickly observed a new area of concern, which had not been brought to my attention by the referring physicians, and to their credit, it may not have been noticeable on other visits. However, Dr. Nazam reassured me that he would take care of everything. He and his dental/surgical team all have great bedside manners,. They equally helped to put me at ease with their warm, funny and engaging dialogue. Lastly, Dr. Sami personally contacted me the evenings of each procedure, I was pleasantly shocked and excited to have my him call to inquire how I was doing as the pain was intense. He explained what he saw during the procedures, what was done to resolve the issues, what to expect over the next few days, and how to address any concerns I may further encounter.  Wow!!!  His follow-up actions spoke volumes to me, VOLUMES...! 🙏🏽👏🏽🙏🏽   Thank you for making me feel like a part of your family. Awesome, awesome job Dr. Nazam, and the Alabama Surgical Arts staff. 😀😀😀

resp.text: Thank you so much! It means the world to us.

name: Faith Hurst
text: I was very nervous about getting my wisdom teeth out, but the entire staff was very kind and didn’t hesitate to joke and laugh with me to ease my nerves. They answered all of my questions patiently and in a way that ensured I had the information I needed, and a nurse walked me out to my driver’s car to make sure I got there safely. The doctor/surgeon himself, Dr. Nazim II, personally called my family a few hours after the surgery to check up on me. I would also like to point out that the COVID safety procedures were excellent. The woman at the front desk wiped the form-signing tablet before anyone used it, everyone wore masks and used hand sanitizer, and they separated clean pens from pens that had been used. I wouldn’t have wanted my teeth taken out anywhere but here and I highly recommend Alabama Surgical Arts for anyone, especially people with anxiety like me.

resp.text: We are so happy to hear we could make the process as easy as possible on you. Happy holidays!

The day of my surgery, the assistants were so sweet and kind. They had plenty of COVID precautions, as well, so 2 thumbs up! I have had NO pain since my surgery. The bleeding stopped within a few hours and I was able to enjoy some soup later on. My face is a bit puffy, but not as much as I thought I'd swell. The night after my surgery, Dr. Nizam called to check in on me to make sure I was alright. I have stitches in my mouth, but they're not bothersome. He really is an amazing surgeon. Everything took less than an hour. I highly recommend going to Alabama Surgical Arts. Overall, positive experience and they helped me overcome my dentophobia. Thank you Alabama Surgical Arts and Dr. Nizam!!

I was put under by Dr Sami, with ease left there with stitches in my gum; again very little discomfort my procedure started at 315p I was home by 430p and wide awake by 530p, I took 2 tylenols , had some soup, it was a good day. Dr.Sami called around 6 like clockwork to check on me. He's  really a very nice person and allows  time to ask questions and I love that and when time permits he'll engage in a bit of small talk and his mannerisms is what I find missing and what I miss a lot in some caregivers today. I'm glad he makes you feel like you matter and you're his patient and he's going to take the best care of you.  Yes, I'm a bit long winded but I just want to give Dr Sami and his team the credit they so deserved and

text:
Dr. Nizam and his staff have been excellent! From the evaluation to surgery and then follow up, everyone has just been so kind.

name: Narrae Allen
text:
Husband was sent here to have all of his wisdom teeth removed at once to avoid infection. The office is very nice, VERY efficient (we were in an out within an hour), and the Dr. himself seems attentive, and even called to check in on us that evening. My problem is with the post-op info - or lack thereof - from the nurse who helped my husband to the car.

She handed me a single sheet that mostly covered medication schedules and dietary restrictions, a pack of gauze, and 4 prescriptions. I have no knowledge of how to care for oral postop things, but my mom's a nurse so i know these things can go smoothly or horribly depending on the patient's choices after surgery - behavior that is usually informed by the advise of medical staff, since the general populace is presumably ignorant (safest assumption). I asked if I needed to replace the gauze as soon as we got home, and was about to ask what all he needed to avoid doing. The nurse quickly said, cordially but also sharply such that she cut me off before i could ask, "everything you need to know is written on this sheet" and told me to call if I had questions. Well, long story short he ended up using a straw and doing a few other things I had no idea he wasn't supposed to, because i didn't //know// those were things i needed to ask about, and the sheet made no mention of any of them. I am now unsure how much of his pain is a natural consequence, and how much is our fault. So now we're keeping an eye on, questioning every symptom, which is stressful for both of us. I acknowledge our fault herein but really feel that this all could have been avoided had we been more informed  about restrictions at discharge

resp.text: I am truthfully sorry you feel you were not given explicit instructions. We try to explain every step of the procedure in detail. I personally call every patient to ask if there are any questions the night of surgery. My personal cell phone is on your post op instructions as well. If you have any questions feel free to call me 24 hours a day. I can be available tomorrow morning if you would like me to take a look. The recommended pain control strategies with maximum dosages are listed on the post op instructions sheet if needed. Hope all is well.  -Dr. Nizam

text: Alabama is blessed and lucky to have this lovely couple in there state to help women and even men feel more confident in themselves, beautiful and thriving! Dr. Nazim emphasized, as I left the office, that I could call his cell at anytime. I hesitated to bother him by phone with an issue on Saturday morning so instead chose to text him with a question. Almost immediately he  returned my text with a  phone call and we discussed the problem.

name: Kerri Krilla
text: For over 20 years I suffered from periodontal disease and was a patient of a well respected Periodontal specialist in Philadelphia. During that time, the intent was to keep my teeth and gums as healthy as possible. Regularly scheduled deep cleaning worked. However, my doctor retired and the new staff had different ideas. The regularly scheduled deep cleaning was no longer an option, and within a couple of years my teeth deteriorated to the point where it was embarrassing to even smile. The new staff recommended extractions, at first only a few teeth. Ultimately, they planned to extract all my teeth and do implants. I agreed to have the first three teeth extracted. That was the beginning of a horrible time for me. After the extractions I bled profusely and was in a lot of pain. For two weeks I continued to bleed on and off. I was frightened ,I could not eat, and I was miserable. As time passed it didn't get much better, and I was not myself, as I was normally very outgoing and talkative, but now became very uncomfortable around people. The staff then recommended extracting the rest of my teeth and doing implants. But I was afraid of what might happen after the last experience. I thought, "if I bled so profusely from 3 extractions, how would my body react to all my teeth being extracted". The thoughts going through my head were all scary and uncertain. I sought out other opinions, but did not have a good feeling with anyone. Finally, in late 2016, I met with Dr. Sam Nizam. When we met, I immediately felt the connection, and I was comfortable. Dr. Sam listened to all my concerns attentively. I knew the qualities in a doctor that I was looking for and Dr. Sam had all of them. Dr. Sam sat me down and explained step by step what he recommended and how the procedures would be done. He was so calm and confident, and did not sugar coat anything. He explained that I needed 26 extractions, and why. He explained that I needed bone grafting for the implants to take, where he would need to do the grafting, and why. He explained that I needed a sinus lift, and where and why. Also, he showed me visually on the computer and pointed out exactly where my implants would be placed, to have the best chance of success. He explained how all procedures would be done at the same time. I was still nervous about the whole process, but I had total confidence in Dr. Sam and agreed to schedule it as soon as possible. It was February, 2018. I was in surgery for 5 1/2 hours. He performed all the work that he had explained to me. I went home, knowing I was in good hands and that I was going to be fine. But I was just a little nervous, thinking I might bleed. Dr. Sam prescribed pain killers, which I took that night and went to sleep. I awoke after a peaceful night sleep. My bleeding was the size of a dime!. I had minimal pain. I stopped taking the pain killers. I went back for a follow up. Dr. Sam was pleased with the results and so was I. No pain, no bleeding, the implants (all 11 of them) all took. I now have new teeth. I can smile again. I can speak without fear and embarrassment. At my daughter's wedding I was able to proudly smile and laugh all night! Dr. Sam gave me my life back! I am myself again! Thank you!! I will always be grateful to Dr. Sam for the incredible work he did, that now gives me the chance to enjoy life as I had not been able to do for so long. If I ever have a problem, even though I now live many states away in New Jersey, I would not hesitate to make the trip. I recommend Dr. Sam highly . He has been blessed with a tremendous talent and gift to help people. I wish him all the best,and pray that his success helps thousands more like me in the future. - Linda K

name: Kristy Mosolino
text:
As someone who fights Melasma and hates using chemicals on my face, I am always looking for different alternatives.  I tried Fraxel laser surgery a few years ago and had a great experience, but the swelling was awful.  Per a recommendation, I went to see Rousso Facial Plastic Surgery!  Dr. Rousso's team suggested that I try a newer, less invasive laser treatment.  Practice Administrator, Nancy Higginbotham answered all my questions that I had regarding the procedure so I felt completely at ease the day it was completed.  Their COVID protocols are outstanding...the best of any office I have been to!

The Pico Laser procedure was completed by Ashley Strickland and Gillian Rogers and they couldn't have been more professional.  They did a great job ensuring that I was comfortable and letting me direct when to stop/go on the treatment since...it being a laser is slightly painful.  I was very pleased with the results.  As it was less invasive than Fraxel, I was able to cover the treatment with makeup and go about my business with no downtime.  I just looked a little wind burnt for a day!

Furthermore the office staff was phenomenal in their follow-up with checking on my progress and scheduling a followup treatment.  Unlike my visit to a local dermatologist, where I felt pressure to "move to the next treatment" ...here I felt at ease with their suggestions but no sales pressure.  I wouldn't hesitate to come in for further procedures at this office!

resp.text: Kristy, what a wonderful review! We appreciate you sharing your experience with us; it was such a reward to read this to everyone! We strive to provide this type of service to every patient that visits our office. Again, thank you so much, we appreciate you!

name: Zariya Johnson
text: I interviewed five highly recommended plastic surgeons about Rihnoplasty. All seemed competent.  Dr Austin Adams stood out because of his warm and down to earth personality.  He listened to me thoroughly.  I knew what I wanted and he let me know what was reasonable to expect.  He was right.  I look great I do not look plastic nor "over corrected". I've already referred 2 people to Dr. Austin Adams  and will continue to be a loyal patient for my own needs in the future. Dr Austin Adams  is a remarkable surgeon. Also the manners of the staff at The Rousso Facial Plastic Surgery is warm, kind, and compassionate. They are the BEST.

resp.text:

name: kirklyn robinson
text:
DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY.
I requested for a consultation before doing my research and going through Dr. Beckenstien’s  before and after pictures once I realized that I did not want to use him anymore because of what I seen on the before and after photos I called to cancel my consultation and get my $150 deposit refunded. The lady told me it would take a week to process it and a week to get my check. No big deal, well a month goes by and no check I call again to see what’s going on and they tell me they just sent the check that week! A month to send a check?? Whatever they tell me I’ll get it any day now another 2 1/2 weeks go by and no check again. I call a THIRD time to see what the hell is going on and they tell me they just send the check 2 days ago. A month and a half has gone by and they just refunded my money? And why did they lie to me 2 1/2 weeks ago when I called and said they had already sent it?! Anyways, I will probably  not be getting my money back but at least I didn’t let them botch my body up. Do not waste your money on a consultation because the minute you feel uncomfortable you will not be getting that money back.

name: Juanita Morgan
text: I was afraid at first but after talking with Dr Beckenstein and his staff, the felling had left me quickly truly a wonderful visit.

text: Dr Beckenstein preformed a tummy tuck and left breast fat transfer on me and I have never felt better in my life. They answered all my questions helped me to feel comfortable about everything that was going to take place. I never had to worry about anything. They even provided me with post surgery scar care instructions and medicine. They were with me to entire journey. I just went for my 2 month check up and everything is looking great better than I even imagined. If you're thinking about getting something done don't do anything until you've seen Dr Beckenstein he's the absolute best there is!!!

text: I had breast reduction surgery last November. Dr B and his staff could not have been better.   This truly has improved my life. Back pain is better, exercise is easier and my breathing has improved.

name: Cha K
text: From Huntsville, Al & Dr. Beckenstein performed a bilateral breast reduction. I chose this doctor because he was 1. Board certified 2. His reviews were phenomenal (so I had to at least give him a shot right). During my consultation he already knew what issues that came with my size & he was respectful about it. Dr. Beckenstein’s staff is patient, knowledgeable & efficient. I saw from other surgeons in the area that staff wasn’t as respectful & the wait time was long. Definitely not the case here. Every last person @ this office plays an important role in making everything run smoothly & I couldn’t have asked for more. I made the best choice. If you are looking @ this review & haven’t scheduled your consultation I advise you to do so immediately, like now, as soon as they open @ 8:30. Also my girls look like a work of art!!!!!!!!!

name: Latosha Taylor
text: I am a medical profession and customer service as well as patient care really is a big deal to me. Speaking to a medical profession that is patient and cares let me know that myself and my patients are in good hands. This office truly rocks in my book. Thank you Dr. Beckenstein. Your staff is amazing

name: Robbin Stewart
text: I was diagnosed with cancer in one breast but elected to have a double mastectomy.  Dr. B is a perfectionist and believe me when I say that is a good thing.  He was able to save my nipples and honestly if you did not know that I had the surgery done, you would not be able to tell by looking.  The scaring is very minimal.  I did not want to go "big"  and Dr. B and his staff were very mindful of my wishes even though they tried to talk me into DD's.  I could not have asked for a nicer, more attentive doctor and staff.

name: Lou Ann Cornelius
text: What a wonderful doctor and staff!  During a cancer diagnosis, a double mastectomy and three reconstructive surgeries, I was a "regular" in this office.  So happy now to be through these deep waters, I will truly miss visiting with these special people!

text: Dr Beckenstein and his staff are wonderful.  I am so grateful I found him ❤️

I would never choose another surgeon to do this job again, and I thank him and his staff for their wonderful support.

text: Welcoming, careing , attentive.  Made me feel at home and at ease.  The best medical experience I have ever received hands down.  I will tell my referring physician and my friends!

text: Dr. Beckenstein and his entire staff are miracle workers!  2 1/2 weeks before a scheduled abdominal hysterectomy, the thought came to me: why am I not having an abdominoplasty at the same time? His staff went above and beyond to help manage this financially for me as well. I’m now 12 days post surgery, and I can not believe the changes in my body. I feel better every day and am so grateful to Dr. Beckenstein and his wonderful team for making my Christmas miracle happen!

name: Charmonika Smith
text: I received a consultation for a breast reduction. I was told that I was a very good candidate for a breast reduction. I gave them all of my information to submit to my insurance to later find out my information was never submitted. I later call back to see if it was submitted and I was given the run around to later receive a phone call to say that they knew what they were doing and they submit claims all the time. Here it is 8 months later and I still haven't received a phone call only a bill in the mail.

name: Ashlyn Sunseri
text: Dr. Beckenstein is not only the best plastic surgeon in Alabama, but an amazing person. I drive from Asheville, NC to see Dr. Beckenstein because I refuse to see anyone else! His staff is incredible and so caring. Thank you for your amazing service!!

name: Sherry Short
text: Dr. Beckenstein and his staff are so caring and supportive. From the moment I met Dr. Beckenstein I felt comfortable and knew I had chosen the right physician. He is an amazing person and Birmingham is blessed to have him!!

name: M Gray
text:
I have nothing but wonderful and positive things to say about my experience with Dr. Beckenstein and his awesome team!!

Whenever I have had to call in with questions the receptionist is always very cordial and connects me with the right person and information.

Dr. Beckenstein and his team values your time; my appointments have been very prompt and efficient and I know that when I schedule my appointments I am not wasting valuable time sitting in the waiting room well beyond my appointment time.  My husband has also taken notice of this and has been very impressed.

For starters, aside from the wonderful efficiency at each appointment, the initial consult was extremely impressive!! Dr. Beckenstein uses modern technology to help in determining the potential outcome of a breath augmentation.  After having two kids, and pumping for a year with both I was not happy with the way my breast looked.  I wanted them to be filled out again and not rely on bras to give me the look that I wanted.  I did not want an obviously augmented look and Dr. Beckenstein listened to my concerns and he delivered beautiful results!! I am one month and three days post surgery and I couldn't be happier with my results!!  Also, the follow up and post op appointments have been great as well!!

I highly recommend Dr. Beckenstein to anyone who desires a breast augmentation!

name: Jane Winters
text:
When you first hear the word "Breast Cancer" you start to panic and then go into shock! You are scared about all the procedures that you must endure to be whole once again. When I decided to have a double mastectomy I knew I wanted the best plastic surgeon in Birmingham. I prayed that the Lord would send me to a doctor that would not only be the best surgeon but also compassionate. I found this in Dr. Beckenstein!! From the moment I walked in the office with my husband and I knew this was where I needed to be. The waiting room was soothing and calm to all that entered.Everyone that I came in contact with was always so helpful and friendly.
After my consultation with Dr. Beckenstein I felt not only encouraged but knew if I had any concerns or problems he would be always be there for me! As I am now  finishing up the reconstruction process I feel that I could have not been more pleased with the outcome.It is wonderful to feel whole once again!!  Dr. Beckenstein has made this possible. He is an amazing and compassionate doctor that goes over and beyond what is expected. I highly recommend him to anyone that is anticipating breast reconstruction or any other related procedures.

name: Suzanne Blocker
text: Dr Beckenstein and his staff are caring, thorough and provide excellent care.  I recommend him without reservation

name: Tonya Whittington
text:
I must share my experience with all.   Nine years ago I had breast cancer and Dr. Beckenstein was the doctor that took care of my breast reconstruction with implants.

Now, to the present day.  Three months ago I was again diagnosed with recurrent breast cancer.   I have been seen by numerous doctors from The Woman's Imaging in Denver Colorado, Slaon Kettering in New York and Johns Hopkins in Washington DC.   Every single doctor and nurse that has seen my breasts are shocked and in total surprise to see how beautiful they look and always comment on the quality of work. Every doctor has asked me who my plastic surgeon was and I am so proud to utter the name Dr. Beckenstein.   I was very happy after my surgery nine years ago but to have others comment and see the expression on their faces nine years later just makes me so happy.  Now I am quite sad the a surgeon in DC will be ruining the works of Dr Beckenstein. I wish doctor Beckenstein could be my doctor once again but asking him to fly to D.C. Is asking a little much.   In short, he is by far the best plastic surgeon you will ever encounter and for those that live in Birmingham-- you are blessed.

Thank you Dr. Beckenstein!!
Tonya Whittington

name: Amiee Reeves
text: Our story may be a little different from others but it's an important story in knowing why to choose Dr. Michael Beckenstein.  There was a little girl across the ocean that had been badly burned as a toddler.  As she grew, so did the scars.  Our prayer was to find a doctor that would be willing to help us help her.  My husband called Dr. Beckenstein and began to tell him of this child in need on the other side of the world and before my husband could finish the story, Dr. B said, "I'll do it...no problem."  Dr. Beckenstein committed to help our family give this child something that I thought may be impossible.  He has gone beyond just being her surgeon...  He has shown us kindness beyond anything I could have imagined.  There is no one that I would trust more.  We have had approximately 14 surgeries and we have gone weekly into his office for the past 5 years.  After each surgery, the scars are being erased and I'm humbled by the gift (his surgical ability) that God has given this man.  And then, there's  his team...oh my his team...they are just like him.  Committed, professional and the kindest people I have ever met.  They are a reflection of him.  I cannot imagine going through this without Dr. Beckenstein and his entire team.  They have been an answered prayer for me and my family and have given our daughter something she never believed could happen.  We are forever grateful to Dr. Beckenstein.  5 stars is not enough for this review. :)

name: Jackie Whisenhunt
text:
This has been an absolute LIFE CHANGING experience for me.  This surgery was the best decision I have made since I had my children.  Dr. Beckenstein, and his very knowledgeable, friendly, understanding, kind staff are more than just professionals in their line of work.  They have made me feel like I've always been a part of their FAMILY.  Not just another patient.  So I have a very special thanks that goes out to all of the ladies that I have seen and that have worked with me before and after my surgery.  Dana, Genger, Bo, Sahvanna, Mandy, and also to Dr. Beckenstein.  These wonderful people have helped me make such a difference in my life, their is nothing that I will ever be able to do or say to show them just how thankful I truly am.  These are definitely the people that I would recommend to anyone.  I know they will be happy that they chose you all.  I know I'm glad I did.  I would do it again.
Jackie Riley

name: Nancy Miles
text: I was so scared when I was diagnosed with breast cancer in June of this year.Dr. Beckenstein and  his staff have been so kind and caring and have been available both day and night. When  you are dealing  with an illness of this magnitude both physically and mentally  this  has meant more than I can adeguately express in this short review. I am now way down the road to recovery and my husband and I could not be more pleased with the results. I feel and even look better than I have in many years. Dr. Beckenstein is a fantastic surgeon and he has surrounded himself, as well,  with a caring and knowlegeable staff. When he tells you he will answer your emails by the next morning,he means it! And when you call his office, you talk to a person and not a machine and that is very reassuring.His skill as a surgeon and his compassion as a person has made all the difference in my recovery. Thanks you guys,you are the best!

name: Holly Stiles
text: My experience with Dr. Beckenstein, his office staff and nurses has been nothing less than great! Scheduling appointments, pre-surgical markings, surgery and post op care has been extremely easy and efficient. I have and will continue to recommend Dr. Beckenstein to my friends looking for a surgeon to perform cosmetic procedures. Dr. Beckenstein's approach is one that I like in that the cosmetic procedures chosen have led people to ask if I've lost weight, worked out more, gotten a hair cut, etc. It's been obvious that something has physically changed but not so obvious that they can pinpoint the procedures performed. This is important to me as I wanted a discrete change, I did not want broadcast to everyone what I was having done! My friends have chosen Dr. Beckenstein to perform their cosmetic procedures and have been as pleased as I have. We all rave about the care we received, the support and honesty that the staff offers as well as the quick access to Dr. Beckenstein and his staff-- calls and questions are answered or returned quickly. Dr. Beckenstein has a great bedside manner and the post op follow up calls to check on his patient(s) are much appreciated!

name: Erica Owens
text: Terrible breast reduction procedure experience. Breasts are still large, nipples deformed, incision scars extended, left breast lower, and back pain still exist.

text: What an amazing experience!  truly one of the most kind, caring, professional, and talented cosmetic surgeons ever. Dr. Koehler contoured my abdomen in ways I never thought were even possible. I could not be happier with the results.

text: Dr. Koehler was extremely professional and polite. Very informative and reassuring on the procedure that was in question. Joy Watkins

text: Dr. Koehler and his staff are amazing! From the first consultation to the follow-up appointment after my breast surgery, they made me feel cared for and at ease. text: Dr. Koehler sits in the place where science and artistry meet.  It feel amazing to have been set free from a lifelong body image issue.  I only wish I invested in myself earlier in my life.

text: I had a wonderful experience with not only Dr. koehler also his staff everyone was  friendly and nice they will make you feel  comfortable and welcome I would tell anyone that’s Interested in getting any type of surgery done that he would definitely be the guy I got exactly what I ask for I feel and look  amazing thanks again

name: Amanda Flowers
text: The entire staff are always so welcoming and professional. My daughter loved Dr.Koehler and staff,he did a great job removing a birthmark on her head. We are appreciative for the great service!

name: Tracy Lee
text: Superb treatment! Everyone explained everything so well. They made me feel special and important. It has been such a positive experience.

name: Terri Hare
text:
Dr Koehler and his staff are professional, caring and are always AVAILABLE, if they are needed.  My results are MUCH better than I even anticipated and I enjoy watching the daily progress.
I give them a well deserved 5 stars.  *****

name: Ashley Green
text: The staff and Dr. Koehler were great! Very nice office and very hospitable. Definitely recommend.

name: Chuck Barrett
text: Excellent facility!  Waiting room is very comfortable.  All the staff were very friendly.....  Dr. Koehler was very professional and yet very personable at the same time.  This was our first visit and we left the office feeling very comfortable about both Dr. Koehler and his staff.  We felt that he was very knowledgeable and took a personal interest in our situation.  There is no doubt in my mind that he is the best at what he does.  Five stars all around for the whole visit!

name: Brittnie Whitt
text: Professional staff who made the process of explant much easier. I’m very pleased with the results from the enbloc/ total capsulectomy performed by Dr. Koehler and would refer him to anyone seeking a skilled surgeon.

name: Lisa Ellis
text: Dr. Koehler, and his team are Awesome! I couldn’t be happier with the results, and I’m already looking forward to my next visit!😊👍

name: Gail Davis
text:
I have had cosmetic work done in Birmingham before I moved to Orange Beach, so I am familiar with cosmetic doctors.  I think Dr. Koehler is great for his politeness, making you feel comfortable and always on time.  One of biggest compliment I can give him is his honesty and the fact that he doesn't try and talk you into something he doesn't think you need.  This quality in this type of doctor is rare and very much appreciated.  It is not all about the money but the quality and care of his patients.

I recommend him to all my friends and the staff is wonderful.  They make you feel special and important.

Thank you for giving me this chance to express my opinion.

Gail Davis

name: David Leach
text: There’s no words to describe the level of care, professionalism, understanding and pleasantness you’ll experience at Dr Khoehler’s clinic. Everyone treats every patient as if they are the only one they have. The staff is second to none on all levels and Dr Koehler’s work speaks unmeasurable volumes for itself. If all medical facilities treated people with this level of care, the world would be a better place. Thank you Dr Koehler to you and your team for providing the best care my wife and I have ever experienced.

name: Sandra Pate
text: Dr Koehler and his staff are the best! Very professional, caring, and high quality results. I highly recommend!!!

name: Janet Taylor
text: I have seen Dr Koehler for 3 or 4 years. My most recent visit I had to wait a few minutes, for the first time ever. He and his staff were, unnecessarily, most apologetic. Things don’t always go as planned. I get that, and hope other patients do as well. The quality of care was per usual, so I have no complaints!

name: Amy Crump
text: Great experience! All of the staff was so nice and professional. Dr. Koehler has a great personality and bedside manner. Truly a wonderful experience.

name: Lindsay McCluskey
text: My experience with Eastern Shore Cosmetic Surgery has been stellar from day one. After significant weight loss, I chose to get a ‘mommy makeover’ which included breast augmentation, full abdominoplasty (tummy tuck), and liposuction of my hips and back. I could not be more pleased with the results. I highly recommend Dr. Koehler to anyone considering any of these procedures.

name: Kaedi Worley
text: 11 years ago Dr. Koehlers work... Art even.. Restored my self confidence and therefore changed my life. Thankful. I will drive 11hours/600 miles to see him before I'd use ANYONE else. He's gifted.

name: Christina DiCocco
text: Friendly, wonderful and accommodating office staff. Cheryl Smith is great, always honest, caring, aims to please and has always given advice to me in "my" best interest for positive results. Thank you all Dr. Koehler and staff!

name: L Peterson
text: Dr Koehler is fantastic! Very knowledgeable and skilled while at the same time caring & patient-focused. He will help guide you to the best choices for you personally.  Increasingly rare in the medical field these days, he puts his patients first.  A great doctor and a great human being.

name: Amy Cuny
text: The staff, nurses and surgery coordinator are exemplary! Dr. Koehler is professional and efficient. Top notch attention to detail that provided the result I wanted. I would highly recommend his/their services.

name: Mary Clay
text: Dr. Koehler was very pleasant and patiently answered my questions.  He gave his honest opinion on my areas of concern and treatment options.

name: Solar Control Systems Window Tinting
text: Very pleased with my procedure.  The staff and Dr Kohler were very professional and they did a great job. I am glad I went to Eastern shore Cosmetic and would always recommend them.

name: Kamrey Nichols
text: I have really enjoyed my experience over the past few months at the Eastern Shore Cosmetic Center. The staff and facility are one of the best I have ever been to. I am looking forward to even more visits in the future.

name: Jerry and Cynthia Blacklaw
text: Dr. Koehlerand his staff are always professional, helpful, kind and caring. My visits are always a pleasure.

name: Rachel Emrich
text: I recently had a breast lift and augmentation. I would glad recommend him to any and everybody! I'm so impressed with my outcome and would do it again in a heartbeat!

name: Tammy Gilmer
text:
Best experience I've had. Everyone makes you feel welcomed and at ease. Everyone is very professional and accommodating.
5 stars hands down!! Thank you all!!

name: Nicole Cunningham
text: I would highly recommend Dr. Koehler to anyone. He has a great bedside manor and made me feel extremely comfortable from my initial consultation to 1 1/2 years post op. His staff is also exceptional. All the ladies that work in his office are knowledgeable, kind and understanding. I drive 2 hours to see Dr. Koehler because he goes above and beyond to ensure his patients are happy with their results. If you need any type of cosmetic procedure, you can’t go wrong with Eastern Shore Cosmetic Surgery!

name: Theresa Presley
text: After extensive research, I was very impressed with Dr Koehler and staffs review. Dr Koehler is open and honest as to what procedure or combination of procedures will give you the best possible results. The staff is the best I have ever come across. So helpful, compassionate, dedicated to the patient. From the front office staff to the nurses and the financial manager. In my opinion and experience I have had the best elective surgery experience. Hands down no other facility could be better..

name: Kristy Shear
text: Dr. Koehler and his staff were all very nice and professional. Great bedside manner and great surgical team. Very pleased and got exactly what I was looking for.

name: gwen moree
text: Dr. Koehler is straight forward, which I Like. Very efficient and attentive all the way through, as well as his Nurses. I could not ask for better. They Are Awesome! Thank You for Eveything!

name: Dr. Brian Pierce, BS, DC
text: I'm getting laser hair removal treatments and I am in and out fast with amazing results. I love the staff, and atmosphere of the office. Would recommend highly!

name: Rene Gill
text: Overall from the time you walk in you know you are in an office that truly cares. Dr. Koehler and his team, to include some of my favorites (Mandy and Jennifer) are awesome at their job. I wouldn't want to be treated anywhere else. Thank you guys for giving 150%.

name: Courtney Brown
text: First time having any cosmetic procedure and had a great experience! Every staff memeber were thorough in there work and made me feel so comfortable! I will definitely recommend Dr. Koehler and his staff to anyone needing a cosmetic procedure.

text: Dr. Koehler is so amazing! His staff and facility were so accommodating. I'm beyond pleased I traveled all this way to see him. I would recommend to anyone!

text: I was treated very professionally and courteously. Dr Koehler was very informative, and explained everything I needed to know to make my determination to proceed with surgery.

text: Dr. Koehler and his team are some of the most experienced, knowledgeable people one could ever meet. There wasn't a question that they couldn't answer, and they were extremely kind as well as polite. At no point did I ever feel uncomfortable. I felt as though I was in great hands. The CRNA Shannon was the icing on the cake. I truly enjoyed my experience with this group and will return for another service in the future.

name: Chris Singleton
text: The miraDry treatment at Eastern Shore Cosmetic Surgery is a procedure that needs to be considered by everyone having sweating issues. I personally tried every solution recommended from different types of antiperspirants to custom t-shirts that were designed specifically for this issue. Finally, I heard about the miraDry procedure provided by Dr. Koehler and his team at Eastern Shore Cosmetic Surgery. They were very knowledgeable and easy to talk with regarding this procedure and the process was very simple from beginning to end.  Brittany and Cheryl were amazing to work with and their professionalism during my procedure was nothing less than perfection. It has been 3 months since my procedure and I am proud to report that I have No Sweating issues at all! Thank you again to Dr. Koehler and the team at Eastern Shore Cosmetic Surgery!

name: Tricia Hudson
text: I had a great experience. Friendly and helpful staff. Dr. Koehler was very professional and kind.

name: Amanda Madden
text: I am absolutely shocked at a WONDERFUL experience I had at my first appointment!  It far exceeded my expectations! Any fears or doubts that I had disappeared once I met with Sarah and Dr Koehler.  I am soooooo excited for my upcoming surgery!!!

name: Kim Pierce
text: Dr Koehler and the entire staff are great. I never waited long for an appointment. I love that his is a perfectionist. I love his work.

text: Always a great experience with Dr. Koehlers staff!! Cheryl is amazing and very detailed!! Wouldn’t go anywhere else😘

name: Shannon Spinks
text: Cheryl is great, and is so thoughtful about making sure that a treatment may help.

name: Jerry Blacklaw
text:
Dr. Koehler and staff provide an excellent and caring experience. From the front desk, to scheduling and payment,  consultation, pre and post procedure, they demonstrated kindness, patience, concern and professionalism.

Brittany was very professional, caring and lovely to be with during my procedure.

name: Kimberly Ferrari
text:
I had a great experience with the entire office. From the time of consultation to waking up after surgery.
All of the girls on staff and Dr. Kohler help you make the right decision for yourself.
Dr. Kohler gives you the best advice. But at the end. Dr. Kohler’s advice was better then my own decision.
I want to let everyone know its scary to go under anesthesia.
When I was administratored mine. It was a relaxing experience.
With the help from Shannon Beall.
Who is the anesthesiologists.
The IV was easy and pain free.
I want to give a big Thank you to everyone at Eastern Shore Cosmetic Surgery!!!!!!

Kimberly Ferrari

text: Great staff and professional!  Procedure in the office was smooth and flawless. Highly recommend!

name: Stephanie Fitzgibbon
text: From the moment I reached out to Dr. Koehler to talk about options to follow up appointments, the quality of care was exceptional.  I flew in from out of town to Alabama because not only did I feel this was the best decision based on the kindness and understanding of Dr. Koehler and his staff but reviewing his work, it speaks for itself.  He is an amazing surgeon.  I am so happy I moved forward with the procedure and love how I look.

name: Nicole Barker
text: Dr Koehler and his staff all took their time going over all my questions and never made me feel rushed. I always appreciate that with a office.

name: danielle smith
text: My experience was awesome as usual! The office staff is very inviting and answered all of my questions. Dr. Koehler and the nursing staff were also very friendly and attentive. The Miradry experience was everything that I expected. The nurses made sure that I was as comfortable as possible during the entire procedure. I look forward to visiting the office again for more laser treatments and a hydrafacial!

name: Theresa Frey
text: I was very impressed with the professional service and courteous staff! Dr Koehler took time to understand my concerns and made me very comfortable.

name: JoAnne Spackman
text: Very pleased with my experience.  Dr. Koehler and his staff provide excellent care.

name: Jennifer Akridge
text: Very professional and Answered all my questions. Staff is very friendly. Wonderful experience.

name: Mary “Mary Liz” Slaton
text:
I recommend Dr Koehler without reservation . He is, without a doubt, a Master Surgeon with a kind and gentle manner. He is always busy but when he spends time with you as a patient, he never acts rushed. Answers all questions and offers explanations and details that make me feel I am in competent hands. I have had 2 separate complicated procedures, each with fabulous results.

The first procedure was a tummy tuck. My abdomin was no doubt my worst feature. He took my worst feature to become one of my best features. I now have a very nice, flat stomach with a little waist. My new "hour glass" figure is way more than I ever expected.

Dr Koehler never delivered big promises, just huge results.

Still healing from my face and neck lift performed a week and a half ago. It is already pretty amazing. My neck had prematurely aged. Now it is smooth and firm with a strong chin. My face is smooth and firm and virtually wrinkle free. I realize after some of the swelling subsides I'll probably need a filler around the mouth area. I can tell there will be no wrinkles around the eyes.

Both procedures have really given me a boost in confidence.  The only drawback is my old loose tops I used to hide my stomach no longer have a place in my closet. It's fun buying new, figure accentuating clothes.

His staff and facilities are impeccable. I felt his fees were very reasonable.  When I received my quotes I was pleasantly surprised with the amounts.

If you're considering a cosmetic procedure, definitely have a consultation with Dr Koehler

name: Mandy Williams
text: Cheryl is amazing, very informative and very thorough....I will definitely be back to see her again!

text: Cheryl is awesome!  I highly recommend her!

text: I had cool sculpting done at this facility.  No change appeared and I was told at other places that I was overcharged for the cool sculpting. I will not return to this facility.  The staff was ok but not real friendly.

resp.text:
It is exceedingly rare to see no result.
I will review your pictures and contact you tomorrow.

name: Debbie Crabb
text: I have not been in the office because they will not respond to me email.

resp.text:
We try to answer all emails- I certainly apologize if we haven’t answered you.
This is a difficult time and everyone is doing the very best they can.  I am sure you will find an office that can meet your needs.

name: Anya Nicholson
text: Dr Petro’s office is professional and clean. Would recommend despite bedside manor which needs improvement. Came in as a new patient for two separate appointments, both in which she made inappropriate off-topic comments about my appearance. With how clean and professional her office is, I would expect higher quality treatment to patients, especially those that are new. Will not be returning due to this experience on separate occasions.

resp.text: You should certainly find a physician whose bedside manner resonates with you.  Being comfortable is essential to getting the results you deserve.

name: Stacy Giovinco
text: Wonderful! Beautiful atmosphere that is calming yet professional atmosphere partnered with Cutting edge technology and a wide variety of medical and esthetic opportunities to improve health, well-being and personal confidence are displayed and explained . I am excited to become part of the Petro 'family'.

resp.text: We are very happy to have you!

name: Lisa Newton
text: I would not recommend this place for the use of Restylane for eye bags!  I had this procedure a few years back and to this day continue to have issues with it!  It looks horrible!!  The staff were friendly and professional though!

resp.text: I would be happy to see you.  Restylane typically lasts 6-8 months so if there are issues persisting for years it should be evaluated.

name: Anne Ryan Cavin
text: Thank you Dr. Petro! The new office is so much better.. great move!

name: J Sosnovik
text: Excited to begin my tattoo removal sessions with Tisha at Petro Cosmetic. So far I was very pleased with the costumer service and facility. I would recommend any family or friends to go in and visit Petro Cometic before committing to anyone else.

name: Grant Greenlee
text: Best ever!!!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank YOU!

name: Life in Camo Media, LLC
text: We have used Jackson Surgery Center three times in the last two years and every visit was a positive experience. The staff is friendly, the nurses are kind and knowledgeable about every procedure we were there for. The staff kept the family/driver informed the entire time the patient was there. The billing department was very easy to work with. I was able to get someone on the phone every time I called to get an insurance issue resolved. I would highly recommend Jackson Surgery Center to anyone that needs the type service they offer. I would give them 10 stars if it were possible.

name: Janice Howell
text: I had a great experience with my kind and caring nurses at my pre-surgery and recovery room time. I'd like to thank Cherri, Philanda and Cheryl personally for their great work. They made sure I was comfortable. As for as the surgery, the anesthesiologist and surgeon made sure I was knocked out for the 7 stitches although I didn't choose to be. Doctor was very late so he didn't want to waste any time. Maybe it was for the best but it was definitely not my choice.

name: Russell Marks
text: I was schedule for a colonoscopy on Mar 4th.  I was notified that I had to report to Surgery Center for Covid 19 test prior to having the procedure.  I called the doctor's office to see if I could have it done in Prattville area as I lived North of Prattville and was told to call Jackson Surgery Center, I did and they said that would be fine.  So I got the test and a letter saying  I had a negative result.  Then next day I get a call from JSC saying what I had was not good enough.  I was asked why I didn't get tested at JSC and explained that it was more convient to have it locally.  She stated that she lived south of Montgomery and came to work every day.  This really upset me!  Long story short I had already spent a whole afternoon getting tested and by the time she called had already begun the prep and had to cancel the procedure.  They need to get better people friendly personal    to contact patients and get there act together as far as what is acceptable covid testing.  I had this procedure at the JSC (prior to Covid) and it was a great experience just glad I didn't have contact with this person back then.

resp.text:
Mr. Marks, thank you for bringing this issue to our attention. We apologize for any confusion.  We will address this issue with our staff, the response you received certainly isn't our expectation. For future reference we have Important Covid Information on our website. You can find it here to review our policies.

https://www.jscal.com/blog/covid-19-information/
If you have further issues or questions please contact our director Missy Sallas 334-293-8484

name: Lisa Hudspeth
text: Better check to see what you owe or they will not do the operation.  They never told me the countless times I’ve spoken with them.  They were extremely hateful.  I asked what I needed and they said insurance card and license.  I drove 4.5 hours and they were going to cancel on me!

name: Vernon Hunter
text: We had a wonderful experience here. Very welcoming and professional. The ladies at the front desk were very nice and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive feedback.  Our team will be really happy to hear you noticed.   Thank you!

name: Rosilind Maxwell
text: I just wanted to tell everyone how much I appreciated you all for being so gracious and concerned about the experience that I had with you all on October 21st. You made an unnerving and uncomfortable situation pleasant and endearing.  Thank you from the bottom of my heart. God bless each and everyone that works in that entire building.

resp.text: We thank you and are very happy to have had a positive impact on your experience.  Thank you for your kind words we will share this with our team.  With sincere appreciation. Take Care!

name: Jason York
text:
We were surprised by having to pay a second co-pay, one for the facility for the doctor. It was explained that this is because the doctor is not affiliated and it is an out patient surgery. However, the doctor's name is listed as part owner, not to mention the fact that we have had out patient surgeries in the past and not had separate co-pays. We will not be using this facility again, as it appears to be using any way possible to take money. We could have refused, but we already had the time scheduled off work, and it's hard to rearrange a surgery. At the very least, they could have let us know this in advance, instead of at the time of the surgery. We will be using the Baptist hospital system from now on.

Update: No, it wasn't really addressed, we were just told that we would have to pay again or reschedule. It's not about the money, it's about letting us know in advance that there are two separate co-pays, which was not done.

resp.text: Hi Jason, we apologize for any miscommunication. Our administrative team is aware of the concern and has addressed this with the patient.  If you need future assistance or have further questions about our billing policies, please contact our Administrator Mr. John Gray 334-293-8484

name: Barbara Sowell
text: Great experience! Wonderful staff. Highly recommend!

name: leo zemke
text: I am glad everyone else had such a fantastic experience at this place but they almost let my step son DIE!  He came in and was scheduled for exploratory surgery to fix SHODDY WORK DONE BY DR CHANDLER during a sinus polyp surgery and my step son began to pour blood from his Sphenopalatine Artery and the office was more worried about getting another three hundred dollar copay out of us than helping my son.  My wife had to scream for help in the office to get nurses and a doctor to get my son and help him.  We were treated shabbily during the whole ordeal.  My step son was bleeding to death and they did not even have the ability to  give him blood at this facility.  They almost killed him!  IT WAS HORRIBLE!  A HORRIBLE ORDEAL!!!!  I should post photos of all the blood.  The clinic manager was not friendly, everyone acted as if they did not know what was going on or what to do.  They had to take my son by ambulance over the the hospital and then the nightmare continued.  The ER doctor threw my son out of the hospital room that he was scheduled to be in.  It was like they tried to kill my son and then they were trying to sweep us under the carpet or out the door.  TO HIDE US AND THE HORRIBLE THINGS THEY DID AND THE WAY THEY ALMOST KILLED MY SON!!!   It was a nightmare!  They were going to give my son a blood transfusion in the ER and sweep us out the door.  MY WIFE HAD TO ENLIST THE HELP OF THE AMBULANCE DRIVERS Who could see that our son was in agony and practically DEAD AT THEIR HANDS!  The ambulance drivers GOD BLESS THEM talked the angry, crazy doctor into keeping our son and putting us in a room for the night.  This was the worst thing that has ever happened to our family.  I would not allow this clinic to operate on a PET COCKROACH if I had one!  PLEASE BEWARE!!!

resp.text: Dear Leo, we sincerely apologize for your experience with the Jackson Surgery Center.  We strive to provide the highest level of care equally to all of our patients.  We appreciate your feedback and are addressing the issues mentioned with our administrative team.  We promise to also forward your concerns to the Jackson Hospital Administration.  Our commitment to protecting patient privacy disallows us to discuss this in an open forum.  Please do not hesitate to contact our administrator John Gray at 334-293-8484

name: Whitney Boutwell
text: Very organized...very clean

resp.text: Thank you Whitney!  We appreciate your observations and are happy to provide healthcare services to you and your loved ones.  I’ll share your comments with our team. Happy Friday!

name: Carol Roberts
text: My husband and I have both been here for minor outpatient procedures. We could not be more impressed with this facility and can enthusiastically recommend it to anyone needing surgery. We both had excellent care while we were there. The nurse even gave me novacaine before placing an IV in my hand (totally unnecessary, but I appreciate the thoughtfulness). I had some questions about anesthesia, and they actually brought the anesthesiologist to me to answer my concerns. After care and instructions were good.

resp.text: Carol we so appreciate your observations.   Thank you for noticing the “little” things we do to make your outpatient experience favorable.  Speedy recovery!  We will check on you soon!

name: Michelle Swofford
text: They took excellent care of my daughter and staff was super friendly.   She had an excellent nurse in recovery.   Everything is very organized from registration to discharge.

name: Keri Chaney
text: This was my first procedure done here. Wonderful staff, very professional. Pleasant experience.

resp.text: Thank you!  We appreciate your kind words and will share with our staff.  Have a super recovery!

name: Vincent Seabrook
text: First class service.  5 star rating.

name: William Wheat
text: Very nice service and friendly staff

resp.text: Thank you William.  I will share your kind remarks with our team.

name: Krista Kiser
text: I'm very happy with the service I received at Premiere Dental Spa. Dr. Teneshia was very informative and professional. I will be returning.

name: Rosemary Davidson
text:
Relaxing environment for a massage. Paul is my favorite massage therapist. Relaxing music, soft lighting, heated table. I return each month (or more). First, Paul does an assessment, observing the way I'm standing, or favoring one sore knee or hip before he begins. And he asks how I'm doing so he can specialize the massage.

Some times he uses hot stones, other times cold therapy, to encourage the tight muscles to relax. His deep tissue massage has increased my flexibility and released trigger points. He educates as he relieves aches and pains, so I can continue the good stretches and healing at home.
The spa offers wonderful services and reasonable prices. There are even packages available with monthly massages, treatments and facials.

name: Valerie Murphy
text:
I called the spa a few times for information and appointment. The young woman answering the phone seemed bothered by my call and quick to end the call. She hung up before completing her sentence.
We are new to Huntsville and the Tennessee Valley. We transferred from Florida to Restone Arsenal. I was expecting some southern hospitality BUT felt quit the opposite. I spend thousands on looking my best. I will NOT hand over my money to rude unappreciated businesses.

I strongly suggest Blue train their employees on PROPER phone etiquette.

name: Kristie Williams
text:
I'm not sure where to start, so I'll start with the positive. The facial was phenomenal. That's the end of the good. The Massage was TERRIBLE and I mean TERRIBLE! WORST I'VE EVER EVER EVER HAD! I teach massage therapy and I'm telling you, this guy would NOT pass my class. Worst experience ever. My best friends little boy can massage better and he's 4!!! Pitiful!
The robes had holes in them, the staff was very loud and didn't seem to care that we were paying a TON of money to be in sessions. People walking up and down the hall clunking LOUD shoes and basically yelling. AWFUL! This was my 1st time to a spa setting because I teach chronic pain therapy. If this is what it's like, I won't go back to another spa. The ONLY reason I gave a 2 was because the facial was very good.
Awful waste of money for everything else

name: VIELKA
text:
Hi I'm Vielka License Massage Therapist  since 2012 and I start working at Blue Med Spa this week 06/16/2017.  and I will like to build clientele there.
I will like to invite you all to give me one try as massage therapist there. and any positive or negative review about my massage are more then welcome, that is what make things better. and about the noise, I will mention this to the new manager. thank you! and hope to see some  you soon on my table.  :)

name: Sonya Bean
text: I had a horrible experience at this spa. I called in advance to get the balance on my gift card and was told it was $70 so I made a massage appointment. When I went to check out the very rude receptionist told me the card was not valid for a massage treatment. I used the same card in the past for a massage for me and my husband. I don’t know why today was any different . I offered to pay the $55 that I owed minus the gift card amount and she wouldn’t take my payment. She would not let me speak to the general manager and told me to call him or her Monday so I left and she stole $70 from my credit card. I will not be back to this spa and will pursue getting my money back. I did not authorize a charge to my credit card. I offered payment of the remaining balance after the gift card and she refused it. Thisp incident was ridiculous and very unprofessional  for such a supposedly high end establishment.

name: Mike Leotta
text: We came here four years ago and it was nice, they had a spa area downstairs with a locker room, sauna, jet tub, showers, and refreshments. My wife and I decided to come here again for a couples massage, like we had the first time and they had moved upstairs. So no more sauna area or any of that. Also, we wanted couples massages but were put in separate rooms, which isn't a big deal really but don't sell them as couples massages on your website and then your guests get a surprise when they're already there saying that oh no we moved upstairs sorry. I could hear someone running the sink in the next room when I was getting a massage. Four years ago it was great. Today, not so much. Their prices are the same and it isn't the spa experience we wanted. It feels like they cheaped out. I'd look elsewhere.

name: Wayne Martin
text: The last two times that I have gone for massages, the masseuse (different each time) talked to me. I left knowing too much personal information about them and their problems. It was very unprofessional. Also, the last massage was 90 minutes. I described tension in my neck as the main reason for being there. I was surprised when the 90 minutes came to an end and my neck had not even been touched. I will be finding an alternative spa in Huntsville.

name: Brittany Dale
text:
My experience at this spa was less than satisfactory. I figured since it was a more upscale spa that I would only have positive things to say, but I was very wrong. I went to get one syringe of Restylane. The doctor examined the structure of my face then proceeded to prepare injecting. First, he did not clean off the area he was injecting. Second, he did not wash his hands or put gloves on before touching all over my face or doing the injection. To no surprise because I have sensitive skin, the very next day I broke out in the same exact spot he touched. While injecting, he was sitting on a stool while I was propped up in the patient’s chair. I’m no doctor but I’m pretty certain that as the injector, he should’ve been standing to get a clear view of exactly where and how much product he was injecting. Lastly, he did not massage or smooth out the product during or immediately after injecting!! Which resulted in a lump. It wasn’t very noticeable from just looking at me from the front. However, I could definitely feel it and from the side view of my face you could tell something wasn’t quite right.

I gave it a couple of days for the slight swelling I had to go down and to give time for the Restylane to settle in. Also, he put more than half the syringe on one side of my face and what felt like air in the other side because there was no difference at all.  ALSO, the lump I felt was more so in the lowest portion of my check rather than the actual smile line where it should’ve been. I’m assuming this was due to him sitting during the injection and not having a clear view of what he was doing. 10 days later, lump is still there. I went back to the office and all he could do was offer to inject another syringe for $100 off. I declined the offer because I refused to spend any more money at that spa. Do not go here to get fillers.

Dr. Marlow at Infinty Med-i-Spa fixed all the issues I had.

name: Jonathan pike
text: I had some laser hair removal done at blue med spa, and  i had a great experience and well trained and pleasant staff that made my time there great. The Massage i had there was awesome to,  Thanks Great Job!

name: Joshua Walters
text: I was initially nervous about surgery, but Dr. Bundrick put me at ease!!  Thanks Doc!  Great staff.  Great all around.

name: Tracy Williams
text: Dr. Bundrick is wonderful!!! He was so patient and answered all of my questions very professionally. GREAT experience!!!

name: Addy Noms
text:
This used to be one of the most well appointed spas in Huntsville.  The female lounge had a hot tub, wet sauna and dry sauna as well as showers.

For the past several months, the hot tub has been broken.  The wet sauna is neglected, dingy and smells like mold when you walk in.  The dry sauna is working correctly.

There's a general aura of neglect that makes the expensive price tag undefendable.  I still have pretty good massages here but I get the sense the place isn't as profitable as it needs to be and maintenance and upkeep is suffering.

For a $100 massage and automatic 18% gratuity, I expect the facilities to be in working and clean order.  For now, I'm going to Terrame where the massages are less expensive and the environment is the same - they have a dry sauna too.

name: John Zuber
text: So So,  The facility really needs cleaning and new robes and sandals.  The personel were fine and did thier jobs, but management is just not keeping the facility up.  While waiting in the waiting room I noticed the heating / cooling vents were extremely dirty to the point of almost stuff hanging down from them.  The robes were dingy and sort of smelly not s nice smell at all.  It convinced me not to get another massage or pedicure at this place again.  Not sure what the health rating was ?  Never saw the inspection/rating sheet.

name: melanie aldridge
text: Disappointed in the filler results.  A follow up left it even worse.  All that money spent, and the trust placed in the doctor.  All of it wasted as I am going to another doctor to rectify the unfortunate results.

text: I wish I could have done this sooner! Dr. Rousso is an absolute artist and couldn’t be more happy with choosing him as my doctor! My results are natural, beautiful, & life changing! 10/10 Recommend!

text: Dr. Rousso did my nose about 5 years ago. He absolutely changed my life. The only thing I saw in the mirror was my nose and I hated it. Now I love my nose, and my side profile. I had consults with two other doctors and both of them said that they would do it but they recommended Dr. Rousso because he specializes in faces and noses. They said he would do a much better job than they could have done. I 100% recommend going to Dr. Rousso for anything face related.. because why wouldn't you want someone who specializes in faces to do your face?

name: Candace Ho
text: My experience with Dr. Rousso and staff has been all positive. From the beginning they worked me in super quickly! I made an appointment, and was in for my surgery within two weeks. I urge patients not to be frustrated by wait times. There are days your visit will be very quick, an other times you will wait. The wait just means he is in a procedure (one can not always control surrgical length) or he is spending ample time with another patient. You will get the same courtesy. All staff members have been top notch in their skill and customer service. Dr Rousso made my nose look completely natural again after a previous surgeon did NOT. I highly recommend a surgeon such as Dr Rousso if you plan on a rhinoplasty. You want someone that does facial work and not body work. I also want to add that he recommends an overnight stay at a hotel so you can be checked by his protege in the evening. I was not happy about this at first, but I promise it is well worth it in the end. Im so glad I stayed and Dr Richards was able to check my progress. I also appreciated the help from the sitter. Dr Rousso and staff have a very together and smooth running operation with great results.

He works with you to help you achieve your goal based on your what your body can give you. I absolutely love him as a surgeon and have been recommending him to all my friends. He also does AMAZING lip fillers as well. I’ve had mine done by him the last two years and every time they honestly look better than the “wish” pictures I’ve shown him. If your thinking about it or on the fence, just trust him and his crew! They will take care of you.
